62#if defined (HAVE_IPP) && (IPP_VERSION_MAJOR >= 7)
63 typedef IppStatus (CV_STDCALL* ippiSetFunc)(const void*, void *, int, IppiSize);
64 typedef IppStatus (CV_STDCALL* ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)(const void*, IppiSize, int, IppiRect, void *, int, IppiRect, double [3][3], int);
65 typedef IppStatus (CV_STDCALL* ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)(const void*, IppiSize, int, IppiRect, void *, int, IppiRect, double [2][3], int);
66 typedef IppStatus (CV_STDCALL* ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)(const void*, IppiSize, int, IppiRect, void*, int, IppiRect, double, double, double, double, int, Ipp8u *);
67
68 template <int channels, typename Type>
69 bool IPPSetSimple(cv::Scalar value, void *dataPointer, int step, IppiSize &size, ippiSetFunc func)
70 {
71 Type values[channels];
72 for( int i = 0; i < channels; i++ )
73 values[i] = (Type)value[i];
74 return func(values, dataPointer, step, size) >= 0;
75 }
76
77 static bool IPPSet(const cv::Scalar &value, void *dataPointer, int step, IppiSize &size, int channels, int depth)
78 {
79 if( channels == 1 )
80 {
81 switch( depth )
82 {
83 case CV_8U:
84 return ippiSet_8u_C1R((Ipp8u)value[0], (Ipp8u *)dataPointer, step, size) >= 0;
85 case CV_16U:
86 return ippiSet_16u_C1R((Ipp16u)value[0], (Ipp16u *)dataPointer, step, size) >= 0;
87 case CV_32F:
88 return ippiSet_32f_C1R((Ipp32f)value[0], (Ipp32f *)dataPointer, step, size) >= 0;
89 }
90 }
91 else
92 {
93 if( channels == 3 )
94 {
95 switch( depth )
96 {
97 case CV_8U:
98 return IPPSetSimple<3, Ipp8u>(value, dataPointer, step, size, (ippiSetFunc)ippiSet_8u_C3R);
99 case CV_16U:
100 return IPPSetSimple<3, Ipp16u>(value, dataPointer, step, size, (ippiSetFunc)ippiSet_16u_C3R);
101 case CV_32F:
102 return IPPSetSimple<3, Ipp32f>(value, dataPointer, step, size, (ippiSetFunc)ippiSet_32f_C3R);
103 }
104 }
105 else if( channels == 4 )
106 {
107 switch( depth )
108 {
109 case CV_8U:
110 return IPPSetSimple<4, Ipp8u>(value, dataPointer, step, size, (ippiSetFunc)ippiSet_8u_C4R);
111 case CV_16U:
112 return IPPSetSimple<4, Ipp16u>(value, dataPointer, step, size, (ippiSetFunc)ippiSet_16u_C4R);
113 case CV_32F:
114 return IPPSetSimple<4, Ipp32f>(value, dataPointer, step, size, (ippiSetFunc)ippiSet_32f_C4R);
115 }
116 }
117 }
118 return false;
119 }
120#endif
121
122/************** interpolation formulas and tables ***************/
123
124const int INTER_RESIZE_COEF_BITS=11;
125const int INTER_RESIZE_COEF_SCALE=1 << INTER_RESIZE_COEF_BITS;
126
127const int INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS=15;
128const int INTER_REMAP_COEF_SCALE=1 << INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS;
129
130static uchar NNDeltaTab_i[INTER_TAB_SIZE2][2];
131
132static float BilinearTab_f[INTER_TAB_SIZE2][2][2];
133static short BilinearTab_i[INTER_TAB_SIZE2][2][2];
134
135#if CV_SSE2
136static short BilinearTab_iC4_buf[INTER_TAB_SIZE2+2][2][8];
137static short (*BilinearTab_iC4)[2][8] = (short (*)[2][8])alignPtr(BilinearTab_iC4_buf, 16);
138#endif
139
140static float BicubicTab_f[INTER_TAB_SIZE2][4][4];
141static short BicubicTab_i[INTER_TAB_SIZE2][4][4];
142
143static float Lanczos4Tab_f[INTER_TAB_SIZE2][8][8];
144static short Lanczos4Tab_i[INTER_TAB_SIZE2][8][8];
145
146static inline void interpolateLinear( float x, float* coeffs )
147{
148 coeffs[0] = 1.f - x;
149 coeffs[1] = x;
150}
151
152static inline void interpolateCubic( float x, float* coeffs )
153{
154 const float A = -0.75f;
155
156 coeffs[0] = ((A*(x + 1) - 5*A)*(x + 1) + 8*A)*(x + 1) - 4*A;
157 coeffs[1] = ((A + 2)*x - (A + 3))*x*x + 1;
158 coeffs[2] = ((A + 2)*(1 - x) - (A + 3))*(1 - x)*(1 - x) + 1;
159 coeffs[3] = 1.f - coeffs[0] - coeffs[1] - coeffs[2];
160}
161
162static inline void interpolateLanczos4( float x, float* coeffs )
163{
164 static const double s45 = 0.70710678118654752440084436210485;
165 static const double cs[][2]=
166 {{1, 0}, {-s45, -s45}, {0, 1}, {s45, -s45}, {-1, 0}, {s45, s45}, {0, -1}, {-s45, s45}};
167
168 if( x < FLT_EPSILON )
169 {
170 for( int i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
171 coeffs[i] = 0;
172 coeffs[3] = 1;
173 return;
174 }
175
176 float sum = 0;
177 double y0=-(x+3)*CV_PI*0.25, s0 = sin(y0), c0=cos(y0);
178 for(int i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
179 {
180 double y = -(x+3-i)*CV_PI*0.25;
181 coeffs[i] = (float)((cs[i][0]*s0 + cs[i][1]*c0)/(y*y));
182 sum += coeffs[i];
183 }
184
185 sum = 1.f/sum;
186 for(int i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
187 coeffs[i] *= sum;
188}
189
190static void initInterTab1D(int method, float* tab, int tabsz)
191{
192 float scale = 1.f/tabsz;
193 if( method == INTER_LINEAR )
194 {
195 for( int i = 0; i < tabsz; i++, tab += 2 )
196 interpolateLinear( i*scale, tab );
197 }
198 else if( method == INTER_CUBIC )
199 {
200 for( int i = 0; i < tabsz; i++, tab += 4 )
201 interpolateCubic( i*scale, tab );
202 }
203 else if( method == INTER_LANCZOS4 )
204 {
205 for( int i = 0; i < tabsz; i++, tab += 8 )
206 interpolateLanczos4( i*scale, tab );
207 }
208 else
209 CV_Error( CV_StsBadArg, "Unknown interpolation method" );
210}
211
212
213static const void* initInterTab2D( int method, bool fixpt )
214{
215 static bool inittab[INTER_MAX+1] = {false};
216 float* tab = 0;
217 short* itab = 0;
218 int ksize = 0;
219 if( method == INTER_LINEAR )
220 tab = BilinearTab_f[0][0], itab = BilinearTab_i[0][0], ksize=2;
221 else if( method == INTER_CUBIC )
222 tab = BicubicTab_f[0][0], itab = BicubicTab_i[0][0], ksize=4;
223 else if( method == INTER_LANCZOS4 )
224 tab = Lanczos4Tab_f[0][0], itab = Lanczos4Tab_i[0][0], ksize=8;
225 else
226 CV_Error( CV_StsBadArg, "Unknown/unsupported interpolation type" );
227
228 if( !inittab[method] )
229 {
230 AutoBuffer<float> _tab(8*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
231 int i, j, k1, k2;
232 initInterTab1D(method, _tab, INTER_TAB_SIZE);
233 for( i = 0; i < INTER_TAB_SIZE; i++ )
234 for( j = 0; j < INTER_TAB_SIZE; j++, tab += ksize*ksize, itab += ksize*ksize )
235 {
236 int isum = 0;
237 NNDeltaTab_i[i*INTER_TAB_SIZE+j][0] = j < INTER_TAB_SIZE/2;
238 NNDeltaTab_i[i*INTER_TAB_SIZE+j][1] = i < INTER_TAB_SIZE/2;
239
240 for( k1 = 0; k1 < ksize; k1++ )
241 {
242 float vy = _tab[i*ksize + k1];
243 for( k2 = 0; k2 < ksize; k2++ )
244 {
245 float v = vy*_tab[j*ksize + k2];
246 tab[k1*ksize + k2] = v;
247 isum += itab[k1*ksize + k2] = saturate_cast<short>(v*INTER_REMAP_COEF_SCALE);
248 }
249 }
250
251 if( isum != INTER_REMAP_COEF_SCALE )
252 {
253 int diff = isum - INTER_REMAP_COEF_SCALE;
254 int ksize2 = ksize/2, Mk1=ksize2, Mk2=ksize2, mk1=ksize2, mk2=ksize2;
255 for( k1 = ksize2; k1 < ksize2+2; k1++ )
256 for( k2 = ksize2; k2 < ksize2+2; k2++ )
257 {
258 if( itab[k1*ksize+k2] < itab[mk1*ksize+mk2] )
259 mk1 = k1, mk2 = k2;
260 else if( itab[k1*ksize+k2] > itab[Mk1*ksize+Mk2] )
261 Mk1 = k1, Mk2 = k2;
262 }
263 if( diff < 0 )
264 itab[Mk1*ksize + Mk2] = (short)(itab[Mk1*ksize + Mk2] - diff);
265 else
266 itab[mk1*ksize + mk2] = (short)(itab[mk1*ksize + mk2] - diff);
267 }
268 }
269 tab -= INTER_TAB_SIZE2*ksize*ksize;
270 itab -= INTER_TAB_SIZE2*ksize*ksize;
271#if CV_SSE2
272 if( method == INTER_LINEAR )
273 {
274 for( i = 0; i < INTER_TAB_SIZE2; i++ )
275 for( j = 0; j < 4; j++ )
276 {
277 BilinearTab_iC4[i][0][j*2] = BilinearTab_i[i][0][0];
278 BilinearTab_iC4[i][0][j*2+1] = BilinearTab_i[i][0][1];
279 BilinearTab_iC4[i][1][j*2] = BilinearTab_i[i][1][0];
280 BilinearTab_iC4[i][1][j*2+1] = BilinearTab_i[i][1][1];
281 }
282 }
283#endif
284 inittab[method] = true;
285 }
286 return fixpt ? (const void*)itab : (const void*)tab;
287}
288
289#ifndef __MINGW32__
290static bool initAllInterTab2D()
291{
292 return initInterTab2D( INTER_LINEAR, false ) &&
293 initInterTab2D( INTER_LINEAR, true ) &&
294 initInterTab2D( INTER_CUBIC, false ) &&
295 initInterTab2D( INTER_CUBIC, true ) &&
296 initInterTab2D( INTER_LANCZOS4, false ) &&
297 initInterTab2D( INTER_LANCZOS4, true );
298}
299
300static volatile bool doInitAllInterTab2D = initAllInterTab2D();
301#endif
302
303template<typename ST, typename DT> struct Cast
304{
305 typedef ST type1;
306 typedef DT rtype;
307
308 DT operator()(ST val) const { return saturate_cast<DT>(val); }
309};
310
311template<typename ST, typename DT, int bits> struct FixedPtCast
312{
313 typedef ST type1;
314 typedef DT rtype;
315 enum { SHIFT = bits, DELTA = 1 << (bits-1) };
316
317 DT operator()(ST val) const { return saturate_cast<DT>((val + DELTA)>>SHIFT); }
318};
319
320/****************************************************************************************\
321* Resize *
322\****************************************************************************************/
323
324class resizeNNInvoker :
325 public ParallelLoopBody
326{
327public:
328 resizeNNInvoker(const Mat& _src, Mat &_dst, int *_x_ofs, int _pix_size4, double _ify) :
329 ParallelLoopBody(), src(_src), dst(_dst), x_ofs(_x_ofs), pix_size4(_pix_size4),
330 ify(_ify)
331 {
332 }
333
334 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
335 {
336 Size ssize = src.size(), dsize = dst.size();
337 int y, x, pix_size = (int)src.elemSize();
338
339 for( y = range.start; y < range.end; y++ )
340 {
341 uchar* D = dst.data + dst.step*y;
342 int sy = std::min(cvFloor(y*ify), ssize.height-1);
343 const uchar* S = src.data + src.step*sy;
344
345 switch( pix_size )
346 {
347 case 1:
348 for( x = 0; x <= dsize.width - 2; x += 2 )
349 {
350 uchar t0 = S[x_ofs[x]];
351 uchar t1 = S[x_ofs[x+1]];
352 D[x] = t0;
353 D[x+1] = t1;
354 }
355
356 for( ; x < dsize.width; x++ )
357 D[x] = S[x_ofs[x]];
358 break;
359 case 2:
360 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
361 *(ushort*)(D + x*2) = *(ushort*)(S + x_ofs[x]);
362 break;
363 case 3:
364 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++, D += 3 )
365 {
366 const uchar* _tS = S + x_ofs[x];
367 D[0] = _tS[0]; D[1] = _tS[1]; D[2] = _tS[2];
368 }
369 break;
370 case 4:
371 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
372 *(int*)(D + x*4) = *(int*)(S + x_ofs[x]);
373 break;
374 case 6:
375 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++, D += 6 )
376 {
377 const ushort* _tS = (const ushort*)(S + x_ofs[x]);
378 ushort* _tD = (ushort*)D;
379 _tD[0] = _tS[0]; _tD[1] = _tS[1]; _tD[2] = _tS[2];
380 }
381 break;
382 case 8:
383 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++, D += 8 )
384 {
385 const int* _tS = (const int*)(S + x_ofs[x]);
386 int* _tD = (int*)D;
387 _tD[0] = _tS[0]; _tD[1] = _tS[1];
388 }
389 break;
390 case 12:
391 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++, D += 12 )
392 {
393 const int* _tS = (const int*)(S + x_ofs[x]);
394 int* _tD = (int*)D;
395 _tD[0] = _tS[0]; _tD[1] = _tS[1]; _tD[2] = _tS[2];
396 }
397 break;
398 default:
399 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++, D += pix_size )
400 {
401 const int* _tS = (const int*)(S + x_ofs[x]);
402 int* _tD = (int*)D;
403 for( int k = 0; k < pix_size4; k++ )
404 _tD[k] = _tS[k];
405 }
406 }
407 }
408 }
409
410private:
411 const Mat src;
412 Mat dst;
413 int* x_ofs, pix_size4;
414 double ify;
415
416 resizeNNInvoker(const resizeNNInvoker&);
417 resizeNNInvoker& operator=(const resizeNNInvoker&);
418};
419
420static void
421resizeNN( const Mat& src, Mat& dst, double fx, double fy )
422{
423 Size ssize = src.size(), dsize = dst.size();
424 AutoBuffer<int> _x_ofs(dsize.width);
425 int* x_ofs = _x_ofs;
426 int pix_size = (int)src.elemSize();
427 int pix_size4 = (int)(pix_size / sizeof(int));
428 double ifx = 1./fx, ify = 1./fy;
429 int x;
430
431 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
432 {
433 int sx = cvFloor(x*ifx);
434 x_ofs[x] = std::min(sx, ssize.width-1)*pix_size;
435 }
436
437 Range range(0, dsize.height);
438 resizeNNInvoker invoker(src, dst, x_ofs, pix_size4, ify);
439 parallel_for_(range, invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
440}
441

451 const uchar*, int, int, int, int, int) const { return 0; }
452};
453
454#if CV_SSE2
455
456static int VResizeLinearVec_32s8u_sse2(const uchar** _src, uchar* dst, const uchar* _beta, int width )
457{
458 const int** src = (const int**)_src;
459 const short* beta = (const short*)_beta;
460 const int *S0 = src[0], *S1 = src[1];
461 int x = 0;
462 __m128i b0 = _mm_set1_epi16(beta[0]), b1 = _mm_set1_epi16(beta[1]);
463 __m128i delta = _mm_set1_epi16(2);
464
465 if( (((size_t)S0|(size_t)S1)&15) == 0 )
466 for( ; x <= width - 16; x += 16 )
467 {
468 __m128i x0, x1, x2, y0, y1, y2;
469 x0 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x));
470 x1 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x + 4));
471 y0 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x));
472 y1 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x + 4));
473 x0 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(x0, 4), _mm_srai_epi32(x1, 4));
474 y0 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(y0, 4), _mm_srai_epi32(y1, 4));
475
476 x1 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x + 8));
477 x2 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x + 12));
478 y1 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x + 8));
479 y2 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x + 12));
480 x1 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(x1, 4), _mm_srai_epi32(x2, 4));
481 y1 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(y1, 4), _mm_srai_epi32(y2, 4));
482
483 x0 = _mm_adds_epi16(_mm_mulhi_epi16( x0, b0 ), _mm_mulhi_epi16( y0, b1 ));
484 x1 = _mm_adds_epi16(_mm_mulhi_epi16( x1, b0 ), _mm_mulhi_epi16( y1, b1 ));
485
486 x0 = _mm_srai_epi16(_mm_adds_epi16(x0, delta), 2);
487 x1 = _mm_srai_epi16(_mm_adds_epi16(x1, delta), 2);
488 _mm_storeu_si128( (__m128i*)(dst + x), _mm_packus_epi16(x0, x1));
489 }
490 else
491 for( ; x <= width - 16; x += 16 )
492 {
493 __m128i x0, x1, x2, y0, y1, y2;
494 x0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x));
495 x1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x + 4));
496 y0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x));
497 y1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x + 4));
498 x0 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(x0, 4), _mm_srai_epi32(x1, 4));
499 y0 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(y0, 4), _mm_srai_epi32(y1, 4));
500
501 x1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x + 8));
502 x2 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x + 12));
503 y1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x + 8));
504 y2 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x + 12));
505 x1 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(x1, 4), _mm_srai_epi32(x2, 4));
506 y1 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(y1, 4), _mm_srai_epi32(y2, 4));
507
508 x0 = _mm_adds_epi16(_mm_mulhi_epi16( x0, b0 ), _mm_mulhi_epi16( y0, b1 ));
509 x1 = _mm_adds_epi16(_mm_mulhi_epi16( x1, b0 ), _mm_mulhi_epi16( y1, b1 ));
510
511 x0 = _mm_srai_epi16(_mm_adds_epi16(x0, delta), 2);
512 x1 = _mm_srai_epi16(_mm_adds_epi16(x1, delta), 2);
513 _mm_storeu_si128( (__m128i*)(dst + x), _mm_packus_epi16(x0, x1));
514 }
515
516 for( ; x < width - 4; x += 4 )
517 {
518 __m128i x0, y0;
519 x0 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x)), 4);
520 y0 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x)), 4);
521 x0 = _mm_packs_epi32(x0, x0);
522 y0 = _mm_packs_epi32(y0, y0);
523 x0 = _mm_adds_epi16(_mm_mulhi_epi16(x0, b0), _mm_mulhi_epi16(y0, b1));
524 x0 = _mm_srai_epi16(_mm_adds_epi16(x0, delta), 2);
525 x0 = _mm_packus_epi16(x0, x0);
526 *(int*)(dst + x) = _mm_cvtsi128_si32(x0);
527 }
528
529 return x;
530}
531
532struct VResizeLinearVec_32s8u
533{
534 int operator()(const uchar** _src, uchar* dst, const uchar* _beta, int width ) const
535 {
536 int processed = 0;
537
538 if( checkHardwareSupport(CV_CPU_AVX2) )
539 processed += VResizeLinearVec_32s8u_avx2(_src, dst, _beta, width);
540
541 if( !processed && checkHardwareSupport(CV_CPU_SSE2) )
542 processed += VResizeLinearVec_32s8u_sse2(_src, dst, _beta, width);
543
544 return processed;
545 }
546};
547
548template<int shiftval>
549int VResizeLinearVec_32f16_sse2(const uchar** _src, uchar* _dst, const uchar* _beta, int width )
550{
551 const float** src = (const float**)_src;
552 const float* beta = (const float*)_beta;
553 const float *S0 = src[0], *S1 = src[1];
554 ushort* dst = (ushort*)_dst;
555 int x = 0;
556
557 __m128 b0 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[0]), b1 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[1]);
558 __m128i preshift = _mm_set1_epi32(shiftval);
559 __m128i postshift = _mm_set1_epi16((short)shiftval);
560
561 if( (((size_t)S0|(size_t)S1)&15) == 0 )
562 for( ; x <= width - 16; x += 16 )
563 {
564 __m128 x0, x1, y0, y1;
565 __m128i t0, t1, t2;
566 x0 = _mm_load_ps(S0 + x);
567 x1 = _mm_load_ps(S0 + x + 4);
568 y0 = _mm_load_ps(S1 + x);
569 y1 = _mm_load_ps(S1 + x + 4);
570
571 x0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1));
572 x1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x1, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y1, b1));
573 t0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x0), preshift);
574 t2 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x1), preshift);
575 t0 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(t0, t2), postshift);
576
577 x0 = _mm_load_ps(S0 + x + 8);
578 x1 = _mm_load_ps(S0 + x + 12);
579 y0 = _mm_load_ps(S1 + x + 8);
580 y1 = _mm_load_ps(S1 + x + 12);
581
582 x0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1));
583 x1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x1, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y1, b1));
584 t1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x0), preshift);
585 t2 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x1), preshift);
586 t1 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(t1, t2), postshift);
587
588 _mm_storeu_si128( (__m128i*)(dst + x), t0);
589 _mm_storeu_si128( (__m128i*)(dst + x + 8), t1);
590 }
591 else
592 for( ; x <= width - 16; x += 16 )
593 {
594 __m128 x0, x1, y0, y1;
595 __m128i t0, t1, t2;
596 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x);
597 x1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x + 4);
598 y0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x);
599 y1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x + 4);
600
601 x0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1));
602 x1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x1, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y1, b1));
603 t0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x0), preshift);
604 t2 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x1), preshift);
605 t0 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(t0, t2), postshift);
606
607 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x + 8);
608 x1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x + 12);
609 y0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x + 8);
610 y1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x + 12);
611
612 x0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1));
613 x1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x1, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y1, b1));
614 t1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x0), preshift);
615 t2 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x1), preshift);
616 t1 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(t1, t2), postshift);
617
618 _mm_storeu_si128( (__m128i*)(dst + x), t0);
619 _mm_storeu_si128( (__m128i*)(dst + x + 8), t1);
620 }
621
622 for( ; x < width - 4; x += 4 )
623 {
624 __m128 x0, y0;
625 __m128i t0;
626 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x);
627 y0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x);
628
629 x0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1));
630 t0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(x0), preshift);
631 t0 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(t0, t0), postshift);
632 _mm_storel_epi64( (__m128i*)(dst + x), t0);
633 }
634
635 return x;
636}

643

646

648 processed += VResizeLinearVec_32f16_sse2<shiftval>(_src, _dst, _beta, width);
649

651 }

657static int VResizeLinearVec_32f_sse(const uchar** _src, uchar* _dst, const uchar* _beta, int width )
658{
659 const float** src = (const float**)_src;
660 const float* beta = (const float*)_beta;
661 const float *S0 = src[0], *S1 = src[1];
662 float* dst = (float*)_dst;
663 int x = 0;
664
665 __m128 b0 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[0]), b1 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[1]);
666
667 if( (((size_t)S0|(size_t)S1)&15) == 0 )
668 for( ; x <= width - 8; x += 8 )
669 {
670 __m128 x0, x1, y0, y1;
671 x0 = _mm_load_ps(S0 + x);
672 x1 = _mm_load_ps(S0 + x + 4);
673 y0 = _mm_load_ps(S1 + x);
674 y1 = _mm_load_ps(S1 + x + 4);
675
676 x0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1));
677 x1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x1, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y1, b1));
678
679 _mm_storeu_ps( dst + x, x0);
680 _mm_storeu_ps( dst + x + 4, x1);
681 }
682 else
683 for( ; x <= width - 8; x += 8 )
684 {
685 __m128 x0, x1, y0, y1;
686 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x);
687 x1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x + 4);
688 y0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x);
689 y1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x + 4);
690
691 x0 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x0, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1));
692 x1 = _mm_add_ps(_mm_mul_ps(x1, b0), _mm_mul_ps(y1, b1));
693
694 _mm_storeu_ps( dst + x, x0);
695 _mm_storeu_ps( dst + x + 4, x1);
696 }
697
698 return x;
699}

717static int VResizeCubicVec_32s8u_sse2(const uchar** _src, uchar* dst, const uchar* _beta, int width )
718{
719 const int** src = (const int**)_src;
720 const short* beta = (const short*)_beta;
721 const int *S0 = src[0], *S1 = src[1], *S2 = src[2], *S3 = src[3];
722 int x = 0;
723 float scale = 1.f/(INTER_RESIZE_COEF_SCALE*INTER_RESIZE_COEF_SCALE);
724 __m128 b0 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[0]*scale), b1 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[1]*scale),
725 b2 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[2]*scale), b3 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[3]*scale);
726
727 if( (((size_t)S0|(size_t)S1|(size_t)S2|(size_t)S3)&15) == 0 )
728 for( ; x <= width - 8; x += 8 )
729 {
730 __m128i x0, x1, y0, y1;
731 __m128 s0, s1, f0, f1;
732 x0 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x));
733 x1 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x + 4));
734 y0 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x));
735 y1 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x + 4));
736
737 s0 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(x0), b0);
738 s1 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(x1), b0);
739 f0 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(y0), b1);
740 f1 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(y1), b1);
741 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, f0);
742 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, f1);
743
744 x0 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S2 + x));
745 x1 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S2 + x + 4));
746 y0 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S3 + x));
747 y1 = _mm_load_si128((const __m128i*)(S3 + x + 4));
748
749 f0 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(x0), b2);
750 f1 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(x1), b2);
751 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, f0);
752 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, f1);
753 f0 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(y0), b3);
754 f1 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(y1), b3);
755 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, f0);
756 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, f1);
757
758 x0 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(s0);
759 x1 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(s1);
760
761 x0 = _mm_packs_epi32(x0, x1);
762 _mm_storel_epi64( (__m128i*)(dst + x), _mm_packus_epi16(x0, x0));
763 }
764 else
765 for( ; x <= width - 8; x += 8 )
766 {
767 __m128i x0, x1, y0, y1;
768 __m128 s0, s1, f0, f1;
769 x0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x));
770 x1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S0 + x + 4));
771 y0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x));
772 y1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S1 + x + 4));
773
774 s0 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(x0), b0);
775 s1 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(x1), b0);
776 f0 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(y0), b1);
777 f1 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(y1), b1);
778 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, f0);
779 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, f1);
780
781 x0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S2 + x));
782 x1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S2 + x + 4));
783 y0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S3 + x));
784 y1 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(S3 + x + 4));
785
786 f0 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(x0), b2);
787 f1 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(x1), b2);
788 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, f0);
789 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, f1);
790 f0 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(y0), b3);
791 f1 = _mm_mul_ps(_mm_cvtepi32_ps(y1), b3);
792 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, f0);
793 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, f1);
794
795 x0 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(s0);
796 x1 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(s1);
797
798 x0 = _mm_packs_epi32(x0, x1);
799 _mm_storel_epi64( (__m128i*)(dst + x), _mm_packus_epi16(x0, x0));
800 }
801
802 return x;
803}

822template<int shiftval>
823int VResizeCubicVec_32f16_sse2(const uchar** _src, uchar* _dst, const uchar* _beta, int width )
824{
825 const float** src = (const float**)_src;
826 const float* beta = (const float*)_beta;
827 const float *S0 = src[0], *S1 = src[1], *S2 = src[2], *S3 = src[3];
828 ushort* dst = (ushort*)_dst;
829 int x = 0;
830 __m128 b0 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[0]), b1 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[1]),
831 b2 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[2]), b3 = _mm_set1_ps(beta[3]);
832 __m128i preshift = _mm_set1_epi32(shiftval);
833 __m128i postshift = _mm_set1_epi16((short)shiftval);
834
835 if( (((size_t)S0|(size_t)S1|(size_t)S2|(size_t)S3)&15) == 0 )
836 for( ; x <= width - 8; x += 8 )
837 {
838 __m128 x0, x1, y0, y1, s0, s1;
839 __m128i t0, t1;
840 x0 = _mm_load_ps(S0 + x);
841 x1 = _mm_load_ps(S0 + x + 4);
842 y0 = _mm_load_ps(S1 + x);
843 y1 = _mm_load_ps(S1 + x + 4);
844
845 s0 = _mm_mul_ps(x0, b0);
846 s1 = _mm_mul_ps(x1, b0);
847 y0 = _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1);
848 y1 = _mm_mul_ps(y1, b1);
849 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, y0);
850 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, y1);
851
852 x0 = _mm_load_ps(S2 + x);
853 x1 = _mm_load_ps(S2 + x + 4);
854 y0 = _mm_load_ps(S3 + x);
855 y1 = _mm_load_ps(S3 + x + 4);
856
857 x0 = _mm_mul_ps(x0, b2);
858 x1 = _mm_mul_ps(x1, b2);
859 y0 = _mm_mul_ps(y0, b3);
860 y1 = _mm_mul_ps(y1, b3);
861 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, x0);
862 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, x1);
863 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, y0);
864 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, y1);
865
866 t0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(s0), preshift);
867 t1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(s1), preshift);
868
869 t0 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(t0, t1), postshift);
870 _mm_storeu_si128( (__m128i*)(dst + x), t0);
871 }
872 else
873 for( ; x <= width - 8; x += 8 )
874 {
875 __m128 x0, x1, y0, y1, s0, s1;
876 __m128i t0, t1;
877 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x);
878 x1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S0 + x + 4);
879 y0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x);
880 y1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S1 + x + 4);
881
882 s0 = _mm_mul_ps(x0, b0);
883 s1 = _mm_mul_ps(x1, b0);
884 y0 = _mm_mul_ps(y0, b1);
885 y1 = _mm_mul_ps(y1, b1);
886 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, y0);
887 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, y1);
888
889 x0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S2 + x);
890 x1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S2 + x + 4);
891 y0 = _mm_loadu_ps(S3 + x);
892 y1 = _mm_loadu_ps(S3 + x + 4);
893
894 x0 = _mm_mul_ps(x0, b2);
895 x1 = _mm_mul_ps(x1, b2);
896 y0 = _mm_mul_ps(y0, b3);
897 y1 = _mm_mul_ps(y1, b3);
898 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, x0);
899 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, x1);
900 s0 = _mm_add_ps(s0, y0);
901 s1 = _mm_add_ps(s1, y1);
902
903 t0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(s0), preshift);
904 t1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_cvtps_epi32(s1), preshift);
905
906 t0 = _mm_add_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(t0, t1), postshift);
907 _mm_storeu_si128( (__m128i*)(dst + x), t0);
908 }
909
910 return x;
911}

1030typedef VResizeNoVec VResizeLinearVec_32s8u;
1031typedef VResizeNoVec VResizeLinearVec_32f16u;
1032typedef VResizeNoVec VResizeLinearVec_32f16s;
1033typedef VResizeNoVec VResizeLinearVec_32f;

1035typedef VResizeNoVec VResizeCubicVec_32s8u;
1036typedef VResizeNoVec VResizeCubicVec_32f16u;
1037typedef VResizeNoVec VResizeCubicVec_32f16s;
1038typedef VResizeNoVec VResizeCubicVec_32f;
1039
1040#endif

1042typedef HResizeNoVec HResizeLinearVec_8u32s;
1043typedef HResizeNoVec HResizeLinearVec_16u32f;
1044typedef HResizeNoVec HResizeLinearVec_16s32f;
1045typedef HResizeNoVec HResizeLinearVec_32f;
1046typedef HResizeNoVec HResizeLinearVec_64f;

1048
1049template<typename T, typename WT, typename AT, int ONE, class VecOp>
1050struct HResizeLinear
1051{
1052 typedef T value_type;
1053 typedef WT buf_type;
1054 typedef AT alpha_type;
1055
1056 void operator()(const T** src, WT** dst, int count,
1057 const int* xofs, const AT* alpha,
1058 int swidth, int dwidth, int cn, int xmin, int xmax ) const
1059 {
1060 int dx, k;
1061 VecOp vecOp;
1062
1063 int dx0 = vecOp((const uchar**)src, (uchar**)dst, count,
1064 xofs, (const uchar*)alpha, swidth, dwidth, cn, xmin, xmax );
1065
1066 for( k = 0; k <= count - 2; k++ )
1067 {
1068 const T *S0 = src[k], *S1 = src[k+1];
1069 WT *D0 = dst[k], *D1 = dst[k+1];
1070 for( dx = dx0; dx < xmax; dx++ )
1071 {
1072 int sx = xofs[dx];
1073 WT a0 = alpha[dx*2], a1 = alpha[dx*2+1];
1074 WT t0 = S0[sx]*a0 + S0[sx + cn]*a1;
1075 WT t1 = S1[sx]*a0 + S1[sx + cn]*a1;
1076 D0[dx] = t0; D1[dx] = t1;
1077 }
1078
1079 for( ; dx < dwidth; dx++ )
1080 {
1081 int sx = xofs[dx];
1082 D0[dx] = WT(S0[sx]*ONE); D1[dx] = WT(S1[sx]*ONE);
1083 }
1084 }
1085
1086 for( ; k < count; k++ )
1087 {
1088 const T *S = src[k];
1089 WT *D = dst[k];
1090 for( dx = 0; dx < xmax; dx++ )
1091 {
1092 int sx = xofs[dx];
1093 D[dx] = S[sx]*alpha[dx*2] + S[sx+cn]*alpha[dx*2+1];
1094 }
1095
1096 for( ; dx < dwidth; dx++ )
1097 D[dx] = WT(S[xofs[dx]]*ONE);
1098 }
1099 }
1100};
1101
1102
1103template<typename T, typename WT, typename AT, class CastOp, class VecOp>
1104struct VResizeLinear
1105{
1106 typedef T value_type;
1107 typedef WT buf_type;
1108 typedef AT alpha_type;
1109
1110 void operator()(const WT** src, T* dst, const AT* beta, int width ) const
1111 {
1112 WT b0 = beta[0], b1 = beta[1];
1113 const WT *S0 = src[0], *S1 = src[1];
1114 CastOp castOp;
1115 VecOp vecOp;
1116
1117 int x = vecOp((const uchar**)src, (uchar*)dst, (const uchar*)beta, width);
1118 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
1119 for( ; x <= width - 4; x += 4 )
1120 {
1121 WT t0, t1;
1122 t0 = S0[x]*b0 + S1[x]*b1;
1123 t1 = S0[x+1]*b0 + S1[x+1]*b1;
1124 dst[x] = castOp(t0); dst[x+1] = castOp(t1);
1125 t0 = S0[x+2]*b0 + S1[x+2]*b1;
1126 t1 = S0[x+3]*b0 + S1[x+3]*b1;
1127 dst[x+2] = castOp(t0); dst[x+3] = castOp(t1);
1128 }
1129 #endif
1130 for( ; x < width; x++ )
1131 dst[x] = castOp(S0[x]*b0 + S1[x]*b1);
1132 }
1133};
1134
1135template<>
1136struct VResizeLinear<uchar, int, short, FixedPtCast<int, uchar, INTER_RESIZE_COEF_BITS*2>, VResizeLinearVec_32s8u>
1137{
1138 typedef uchar value_type;
1139 typedef int buf_type;
1140 typedef short alpha_type;
1141
1142 void operator()(const buf_type** src, value_type* dst, const alpha_type* beta, int width ) const
1143 {
1144 alpha_type b0 = beta[0], b1 = beta[1];
1145 const buf_type *S0 = src[0], *S1 = src[1];
1146 VResizeLinearVec_32s8u vecOp;
1147
1148 int x = vecOp((const uchar**)src, (uchar*)dst, (const uchar*)beta, width);
1149 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
1150 for( ; x <= width - 4; x += 4 )
1151 {
1152 dst[x+0] = uchar(( ((b0 * (S0[x+0] >> 4)) >> 16) + ((b1 * (S1[x+0] >> 4)) >> 16) + 2)>>2);
1153 dst[x+1] = uchar(( ((b0 * (S0[x+1] >> 4)) >> 16) + ((b1 * (S1[x+1] >> 4)) >> 16) + 2)>>2);
1154 dst[x+2] = uchar(( ((b0 * (S0[x+2] >> 4)) >> 16) + ((b1 * (S1[x+2] >> 4)) >> 16) + 2)>>2);
1155 dst[x+3] = uchar(( ((b0 * (S0[x+3] >> 4)) >> 16) + ((b1 * (S1[x+3] >> 4)) >> 16) + 2)>>2);
1156 }
1157 #endif
1158 for( ; x < width; x++ )
1159 dst[x] = uchar(( ((b0 * (S0[x] >> 4)) >> 16) + ((b1 * (S1[x] >> 4)) >> 16) + 2)>>2);
1160 }
1161};

1163
1164template<typename T, typename WT, typename AT>
1165struct HResizeCubic
1166{
1167 typedef T value_type;
1168 typedef WT buf_type;
1169 typedef AT alpha_type;
1170
1171 void operator()(const T** src, WT** dst, int count,
1172 const int* xofs, const AT* alpha,
1173 int swidth, int dwidth, int cn, int xmin, int xmax ) const
1174 {
1175 for( int k = 0; k < count; k++ )
1176 {
1177 const T *S = src[k];
1178 WT *D = dst[k];
1179 int dx = 0, limit = xmin;
1180 for(;;)
1181 {
1182 for( ; dx < limit; dx++, alpha += 4 )
1183 {
1184 int j, sx = xofs[dx] - cn;
1185 WT v = 0;
1186 for( j = 0; j < 4; j++ )
1187 {
1188 int sxj = sx + j*cn;
1189 if( (unsigned)sxj >= (unsigned)swidth )
1190 {
1191 while( sxj < 0 )
1192 sxj += cn;
1193 while( sxj >= swidth )
1194 sxj -= cn;
1195 }
1196 v += S[sxj]*alpha[j];
1197 }
1198 D[dx] = v;
1199 }
1200 if( limit == dwidth )
1201 break;
1202 for( ; dx < xmax; dx++, alpha += 4 )
1203 {
1204 int sx = xofs[dx];
1205 D[dx] = S[sx-cn]*alpha[0] + S[sx]*alpha[1] +
1206 S[sx+cn]*alpha[2] + S[sx+cn*2]*alpha[3];
1207 }
1208 limit = dwidth;
1209 }
1210 alpha -= dwidth*4;
1211 }
1212 }
1213};
1214
1215
1216template<typename T, typename WT, typename AT, class CastOp, class VecOp>
1217struct VResizeCubic
1218{
1219 typedef T value_type;
1220 typedef WT buf_type;
1221 typedef AT alpha_type;
1222
1223 void operator()(const WT** src, T* dst, const AT* beta, int width ) const
1224 {
1225 WT b0 = beta[0], b1 = beta[1], b2 = beta[2], b3 = beta[3];
1226 const WT *S0 = src[0], *S1 = src[1], *S2 = src[2], *S3 = src[3];
1227 CastOp castOp;
1228 VecOp vecOp;
1229
1230 int x = vecOp((const uchar**)src, (uchar*)dst, (const uchar*)beta, width);
1231 for( ; x < width; x++ )
1232 dst[x] = castOp(S0[x]*b0 + S1[x]*b1 + S2[x]*b2 + S3[x]*b3);
1233 }
1234};

1237template<typename T, typename WT, typename AT>
1238struct HResizeLanczos4
1239{
1240 typedef T value_type;
1241 typedef WT buf_type;
1242 typedef AT alpha_type;
1243
1244 void operator()(const T** src, WT** dst, int count,
1245 const int* xofs, const AT* alpha,
1246 int swidth, int dwidth, int cn, int xmin, int xmax ) const
1247 {
1248 for( int k = 0; k < count; k++ )
1249 {
1250 const T *S = src[k];
1251 WT *D = dst[k];
1252 int dx = 0, limit = xmin;
1253 for(;;)
1254 {
1255 for( ; dx < limit; dx++, alpha += 8 )
1256 {
1257 int j, sx = xofs[dx] - cn*3;
1258 WT v = 0;
1259 for( j = 0; j < 8; j++ )
1260 {
1261 int sxj = sx + j*cn;
1262 if( (unsigned)sxj >= (unsigned)swidth )
1263 {
1264 while( sxj < 0 )
1265 sxj += cn;
1266 while( sxj >= swidth )
1267 sxj -= cn;
1268 }
1269 v += S[sxj]*alpha[j];
1270 }
1271 D[dx] = v;
1272 }
1273 if( limit == dwidth )
1274 break;
1275 for( ; dx < xmax; dx++, alpha += 8 )
1276 {
1277 int sx = xofs[dx];
1278 D[dx] = S[sx-cn*3]*alpha[0] + S[sx-cn*2]*alpha[1] +
1279 S[sx-cn]*alpha[2] + S[sx]*alpha[3] +
1280 S[sx+cn]*alpha[4] + S[sx+cn*2]*alpha[5] +
1281 S[sx+cn*3]*alpha[6] + S[sx+cn*4]*alpha[7];
1282 }
1283 limit = dwidth;
1284 }
1285 alpha -= dwidth*8;
1286 }
1287 }
1288};

1290
1291template<typename T, typename WT, typename AT, class CastOp, class VecOp>
1292struct VResizeLanczos4
1293{
1294 typedef T value_type;
1295 typedef WT buf_type;
1296 typedef AT alpha_type;
1297
1298 void operator()(const WT** src, T* dst, const AT* beta, int width ) const
1299 {
1300 CastOp castOp;
1301 VecOp vecOp;
1302 int k, x = vecOp((const uchar**)src, (uchar*)dst, (const uchar*)beta, width);
1303 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
1304 for( ; x <= width - 4; x += 4 )
1305 {
1306 WT b = beta[0];
1307 const WT* S = src[0];
1308 WT s0 = S[x]*b, s1 = S[x+1]*b, s2 = S[x+2]*b, s3 = S[x+3]*b;
1309
1310 for( k = 1; k < 8; k++ )
1311 {
1312 b = beta[k]; S = src[k];
1313 s0 += S[x]*b; s1 += S[x+1]*b;
1314 s2 += S[x+2]*b; s3 += S[x+3]*b;
1315 }
1316
1317 dst[x] = castOp(s0); dst[x+1] = castOp(s1);
1318 dst[x+2] = castOp(s2); dst[x+3] = castOp(s3);
1319 }
1320 #endif
1321 for( ; x < width; x++ )
1322 {
1323 dst[x] = castOp(src[0][x]*beta[0] + src[1][x]*beta[1] +
1324 src[2][x]*beta[2] + src[3][x]*beta[3] + src[4][x]*beta[4] +
1325 src[5][x]*beta[5] + src[6][x]*beta[6] + src[7][x]*beta[7]);
1326 }
1327 }
1328};

1330
1331static inline int clip(int x, int a, int b)
1332{
1333 return x >= a ? (x < b ? x : b-1) : a;
1334}
1335
1336static const int MAX_ESIZE=16;
1337
1338template <typename HResize, typename VResize>
1339class resizeGeneric_Invoker :
1340 public ParallelLoopBody
1341{
1342public:
1343 typedef typename HResize::value_type T;
1344 typedef typename HResize::buf_type WT;
1345 typedef typename HResize::alpha_type AT;
1346
1347 resizeGeneric_Invoker(const Mat& _src, Mat &_dst, const int *_xofs, const int *_yofs,
1348 const AT* _alpha, const AT* __beta, const Size& _ssize, const Size &_dsize,
1349 int _ksize, int _xmin, int _xmax) :
1350 ParallelLoopBody(), src(_src), dst(_dst), xofs(_xofs), yofs(_yofs),
1351 alpha(_alpha), _beta(__beta), ssize(_ssize), dsize(_dsize),
1352 ksize(_ksize), xmin(_xmin), xmax(_xmax)
1353 {
1354 CV_Assert(ksize <= MAX_ESIZE);
1355 }
1356
1357#if defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ == 4) && (__GNUC_MINOR__ == 8)
1358# pragma GCC diagnostic push
1359# pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Warray-bounds"
1360#endif
1361 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
1362 {
1363 int dy, cn = src.channels();
1364 HResize hresize;
1365 VResize vresize;
1366
1367 int bufstep = (int)alignSize(dsize.width, 16);
1368 AutoBuffer<WT> _buffer(bufstep*ksize);
1369 const T* srows[MAX_ESIZE]={0};
1370 WT* rows[MAX_ESIZE]={0};
1371 int prev_sy[MAX_ESIZE];
1372
1373 for(int k = 0; k < ksize; k++ )
1374 {
1375 prev_sy[k] = -1;
1376 rows[k] = (WT*)_buffer + bufstep*k;
1377 }
1378
1379 const AT* beta = _beta + ksize * range.start;
1380
1381 for( dy = range.start; dy < range.end; dy++, beta += ksize )
1382 {
1383 int sy0 = yofs[dy], k0=ksize, k1=0, ksize2 = ksize/2;
1384
1385 for(int k = 0; k < ksize; k++ )
1386 {
1387 int sy = clip(sy0 - ksize2 + 1 + k, 0, ssize.height);
1388 for( k1 = std::max(k1, k); k1 < ksize; k1++ )
1389 {
1390 if( sy == prev_sy[k1] ) // if the sy-th row has been computed already, reuse it.
1391 {
1392 if( k1 > k )
1393 memcpy( rows[k], rows[k1], bufstep*sizeof(rows[0][0]) );
1394 break;
1395 }
1396 }
1397 if( k1 == ksize )
1398 k0 = std::min(k0, k); // remember the first row that needs to be computed
1399 srows[k] = (T*)(src.data + src.step*sy);
1400 prev_sy[k] = sy;
1401 }
1402
1403 if( k0 < ksize )
1404 hresize( (const T**)(srows + k0), (WT**)(rows + k0), ksize - k0, xofs, (const AT*)(alpha),
1405 ssize.width, dsize.width, cn, xmin, xmax );
1406 vresize( (const WT**)rows, (T*)(dst.data + dst.step*dy), beta, dsize.width );
1407 }
1408 }
1409#if defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ == 4) && (__GNUC_MINOR__ == 8)
1410# pragma GCC diagnostic pop
1411#endif
1412
1413private:
1414 Mat src;
1415 Mat dst;
1416 const int* xofs, *yofs;
1417 const AT* alpha, *_beta;
1418 Size ssize, dsize;
1419 const int ksize, xmin, xmax;
1420
1421 resizeGeneric_Invoker& operator = (const resizeGeneric_Invoker&);
1422};
1423
1424template<class HResize, class VResize>
1425static void resizeGeneric_( const Mat& src, Mat& dst,
1426 const int* xofs, const void* _alpha,
1427 const int* yofs, const void* _beta,
1428 int xmin, int xmax, int ksize )
1429{
1430 typedef typename HResize::alpha_type AT;
1431
1432 const AT* beta = (const AT*)_beta;
1433 Size ssize = src.size(), dsize = dst.size();
1434 int cn = src.channels();
1435 ssize.width *= cn;
1436 dsize.width *= cn;
1437 xmin *= cn;
1438 xmax *= cn;
1439 // image resize is a separable operation. In case of not too strong
1440
1441 Range range(0, dsize.height);
1442 resizeGeneric_Invoker<HResize, VResize> invoker(src, dst, xofs, yofs, (const AT*)_alpha, beta,
1443 ssize, dsize, ksize, xmin, xmax);
1444 parallel_for_(range, invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
1445}
1446
1447template <typename T, typename WT>
1448struct ResizeAreaFastNoVec
1449{
1450 ResizeAreaFastNoVec(int /*_scale_x*/, int /*_scale_y*/,
1451 int /*_cn*/, int /*_step*//*, const int**/ /*_ofs*/) { }
1452 int operator() (const T* /*S*/, T* /*D*/, int /*w*/) const { return 0; }
1453};
1454
1455template<typename T>
1456struct ResizeAreaFastVec
1457{
1458 ResizeAreaFastVec(int _scale_x, int _scale_y, int _cn, int _step/*, const int* _ofs*/) :
1459 scale_x(_scale_x), scale_y(_scale_y), cn(_cn), step(_step)/*, ofs(_ofs)*/
1460 {
1461 fast_mode = scale_x == 2 && scale_y == 2 && (cn == 1 || cn == 3 || cn == 4);
1462 }
1463
1464 int operator() (const T* S, T* D, int w) const
1465 {
1466 if( !fast_mode )
1467 return 0;
1468
1469 const T* nextS = (const T*)((const uchar*)S + step);
1470 int dx = 0;
1471
1472 if (cn == 1)
1473 for( ; dx < w; ++dx )
1474 {
1475 int index = dx*2;
1476 D[dx] = (T)((S[index] + S[index+1] + nextS[index] + nextS[index+1] + 2) >> 2);
1477 }
1478 else if (cn == 3)
1479 for( ; dx < w; dx += 3 )
1480 {
1481 int index = dx*2;
1482 D[dx] = (T)((S[index] + S[index+3] + nextS[index] + nextS[index+3] + 2) >> 2);
1483 D[dx+1] = (T)((S[index+1] + S[index+4] + nextS[index+1] + nextS[index+4] + 2) >> 2);
1484 D[dx+2] = (T)((S[index+2] + S[index+5] + nextS[index+2] + nextS[index+5] + 2) >> 2);
1485 }
1486 else
1487 {
1488 assert(cn == 4);
1489 for( ; dx < w; dx += 4 )
1490 {
1491 int index = dx*2;
1492 D[dx] = (T)((S[index] + S[index+4] + nextS[index] + nextS[index+4] + 2) >> 2);
1493 D[dx+1] = (T)((S[index+1] + S[index+5] + nextS[index+1] + nextS[index+5] + 2) >> 2);
1494 D[dx+2] = (T)((S[index+2] + S[index+6] + nextS[index+2] + nextS[index+6] + 2) >> 2);
1495 D[dx+3] = (T)((S[index+3] + S[index+7] + nextS[index+3] + nextS[index+7] + 2) >> 2);
1496 }
1497 }
1498
1499 return dx;
1500 }
1501
1502private:
1503 int scale_x, scale_y;
1504 int cn;
1505 bool fast_mode;
1506 int step;
1507};
1508
1509template <typename T, typename WT, typename VecOp>
1510class resizeAreaFast_Invoker :
1511 public ParallelLoopBody
1512{
1513public:
1514 resizeAreaFast_Invoker(const Mat &_src, Mat &_dst,
1515 int _scale_x, int _scale_y, const int* _ofs, const int* _xofs) :
1516 ParallelLoopBody(), src(_src), dst(_dst), scale_x(_scale_x),
1517 scale_y(_scale_y), ofs(_ofs), xofs(_xofs)
1518 {
1519 }
1520
1521 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
1522 {
1523 Size ssize = src.size(), dsize = dst.size();
1524 int cn = src.channels();
1525 int area = scale_x*scale_y;
1526 float scale = 1.f/(area);
1527 int dwidth1 = (ssize.width/scale_x)*cn;
1528 dsize.width *= cn;
1529 ssize.width *= cn;
1530 int dy, dx, k = 0;
1531
1532 VecOp vop(scale_x, scale_y, src.channels(), (int)src.step/*, area_ofs*/);
1533
1534 for( dy = range.start; dy < range.end; dy++ )
1535 {
1536 T* D = (T*)(dst.data + dst.step*dy);
1537 int sy0 = dy*scale_y;
1538 int w = sy0 + scale_y <= ssize.height ? dwidth1 : 0;
1539
1540 if( sy0 >= ssize.height )
1541 {
1542 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
1543 D[dx] = 0;
1544 continue;
1545 }
1546
1547 dx = vop((const T*)(src.data + src.step * sy0), D, w);
1548 for( ; dx < w; dx++ )
1549 {
1550 const T* S = (const T*)(src.data + src.step * sy0) + xofs[dx];
1551 WT sum = 0;
1552 k = 0;
1553 #if CV_ENABLE_UNROLLED
1554 for( ; k <= area - 4; k += 4 )
1555 sum += S[ofs[k]] + S[ofs[k+1]] + S[ofs[k+2]] + S[ofs[k+3]];
1556 #endif
1557 for( ; k < area; k++ )
1558 sum += S[ofs[k]];
1559
1560 D[dx] = saturate_cast<T>(sum * scale);
1561 }
1562
1563 for( ; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
1564 {
1565 WT sum = 0;
1566 int count = 0, sx0 = xofs[dx];
1567 if( sx0 >= ssize.width )
1568 D[dx] = 0;
1569
1570 for( int sy = 0; sy < scale_y; sy++ )
1571 {
1572 if( sy0 + sy >= ssize.height )
1573 break;
1574 const T* S = (const T*)(src.data + src.step*(sy0 + sy)) + sx0;
1575 for( int sx = 0; sx < scale_x*cn; sx += cn )
1576 {
1577 if( sx0 + sx >= ssize.width )
1578 break;
1579 sum += S[sx];
1580 count++;
1581 }
1582 }
1583
1584 D[dx] = saturate_cast<T>((float)sum/count);
1585 }
1586 }
1587 }
1588
1589private:
1590 Mat src;
1591 Mat dst;
1592 int scale_x, scale_y;
1593 const int *ofs, *xofs;
1594};
1595
1596template<typename T, typename WT, typename VecOp>
1597static void resizeAreaFast_( const Mat& src, Mat& dst, const int* ofs, const int* xofs,
1598 int scale_x, int scale_y )
1599{
1600 Range range(0, dst.rows);
1601 resizeAreaFast_Invoker<T, WT, VecOp> invoker(src, dst, scale_x,
1602 scale_y, ofs, xofs);
1603 parallel_for_(range, invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
1604}
1605
1606struct DecimateAlpha
1607{
1608 int si, di;
1609 float alpha;
1610};
1611
1612
1613template<typename T, typename WT> class ResizeArea_Invoker :
1614 public ParallelLoopBody
1615{
1616public:
1617 ResizeArea_Invoker( const Mat& _src, Mat& _dst,
1618 const DecimateAlpha* _xtab, int _xtab_size,
1619 const DecimateAlpha* _ytab, int _ytab_size,
1620 const int* _tabofs )
1621 {
1622 src = &_src;
1623 dst = &_dst;
1624 xtab0 = _xtab;
1625 xtab_size0 = _xtab_size;
1626 ytab = _ytab;
1627 ytab_size = _ytab_size;
1628 tabofs = _tabofs;
1629 }
1630
1631 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
1632 {
1633 Size dsize = dst->size();
1634 int cn = dst->channels();
1635 dsize.width *= cn;
1636 AutoBuffer<WT> _buffer(dsize.width*2);
1637 const DecimateAlpha* xtab = xtab0;
1638 int xtab_size = xtab_size0;
1639 WT *buf = _buffer, *sum = buf + dsize.width;
1640 int j_start = tabofs[range.start], j_end = tabofs[range.end], j, k, dx, prev_dy = ytab[j_start].di;
1641
1642 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
1643 sum[dx] = (WT)0;
1644
1645 for( j = j_start; j < j_end; j++ )
1646 {
1647 WT beta = ytab[j].alpha;
1648 int dy = ytab[j].di;
1649 int sy = ytab[j].si;
1650
1651 {
1652 const T* S = (const T*)(src->data + src->step*sy);
1653 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
1654 buf[dx] = (WT)0;
1655
1656 if( cn == 1 )
1657 for( k = 0; k < xtab_size; k++ )
1658 {
1659 int dxn = xtab[k].di;
1660 WT alpha = xtab[k].alpha;
1661 buf[dxn] += S[xtab[k].si]*alpha;
1662 }
1663 else if( cn == 2 )
1664 for( k = 0; k < xtab_size; k++ )
1665 {
1666 int sxn = xtab[k].si;
1667 int dxn = xtab[k].di;
1668 WT alpha = xtab[k].alpha;
1669 WT t0 = buf[dxn] + S[sxn]*alpha;
1670 WT t1 = buf[dxn+1] + S[sxn+1]*alpha;
1671 buf[dxn] = t0; buf[dxn+1] = t1;
1672 }
1673 else if( cn == 3 )
1674 for( k = 0; k < xtab_size; k++ )
1675 {
1676 int sxn = xtab[k].si;
1677 int dxn = xtab[k].di;
1678 WT alpha = xtab[k].alpha;
1679 WT t0 = buf[dxn] + S[sxn]*alpha;
1680 WT t1 = buf[dxn+1] + S[sxn+1]*alpha;
1681 WT t2 = buf[dxn+2] + S[sxn+2]*alpha;
1682 buf[dxn] = t0; buf[dxn+1] = t1; buf[dxn+2] = t2;
1683 }
1684 else if( cn == 4 )
1685 {
1686 for( k = 0; k < xtab_size; k++ )
1687 {
1688 int sxn = xtab[k].si;
1689 int dxn = xtab[k].di;
1690 WT alpha = xtab[k].alpha;
1691 WT t0 = buf[dxn] + S[sxn]*alpha;
1692 WT t1 = buf[dxn+1] + S[sxn+1]*alpha;
1693 buf[dxn] = t0; buf[dxn+1] = t1;
1694 t0 = buf[dxn+2] + S[sxn+2]*alpha;
1695 t1 = buf[dxn+3] + S[sxn+3]*alpha;
1696 buf[dxn+2] = t0; buf[dxn+3] = t1;
1697 }
1698 }
1699 else
1700 {
1701 for( k = 0; k < xtab_size; k++ )
1702 {
1703 int sxn = xtab[k].si;
1704 int dxn = xtab[k].di;
1705 WT alpha = xtab[k].alpha;
1706 for( int c = 0; c < cn; c++ )
1707 buf[dxn + c] += S[sxn + c]*alpha;
1708 }
1709 }
1710 }
1711
1712 if( dy != prev_dy )
1713 {
1714 T* D = (T*)(dst->data + dst->step*prev_dy);
1715
1716 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
1717 {
1718 D[dx] = saturate_cast<T>(sum[dx]);
1719 sum[dx] = beta*buf[dx];
1720 }
1721 prev_dy = dy;
1722 }
1723 else
1724 {
1725 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
1726 sum[dx] += beta*buf[dx];
1727 }
1728 }
1729
1730 {
1731 T* D = (T*)(dst->data + dst->step*prev_dy);
1732 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
1733 D[dx] = saturate_cast<T>(sum[dx]);
1734 }
1735 }
1736
1737private:
1738 const Mat* src;
1739 Mat* dst;
1740 const DecimateAlpha* xtab0;
1741 const DecimateAlpha* ytab;
1742 int xtab_size0, ytab_size;
1743 const int* tabofs;
1744};
1745
1746
1747template <typename T, typename WT>
1748static void resizeArea_( const Mat& src, Mat& dst,
1749 const DecimateAlpha* xtab, int xtab_size,
1750 const DecimateAlpha* ytab, int ytab_size,
1751 const int* tabofs )
1752{
1753 parallel_for_(Range(0, dst.rows),
1754 ResizeArea_Invoker<T, WT>(src, dst, xtab, xtab_size, ytab, ytab_size, tabofs),
1755 dst.total()/((double)(1 << 16)));
1756}
1757
1758
1759typedef void (*ResizeFunc)( const Mat& src, Mat& dst,
1760 const int* xofs, const void* alpha,
1761 const int* yofs, const void* beta,
1762 int xmin, int xmax, int ksize );
1763
1764typedef void (*ResizeAreaFastFunc)( const Mat& src, Mat& dst,
1765 const int* ofs, const int *xofs,
1766 int scale_x, int scale_y );
1767
1768typedef void (*ResizeAreaFunc)( const Mat& src, Mat& dst,
1769 const DecimateAlpha* xtab, int xtab_size,
1770 const DecimateAlpha* ytab, int ytab_size,
1771 const int* yofs);
1772
1773
1774static int computeResizeAreaTab( int ssize, int dsize, int cn, double scale, DecimateAlpha* tab )
1775{
1776 int k = 0;
1777 for(int dx = 0; dx < dsize; dx++ )
1778 {
1779 double fsx1 = dx * scale;
1780 double fsx2 = fsx1 + scale;
1781 double cellWidth = min(scale, ssize - fsx1);
1782
1783 int sx1 = cvCeil(fsx1), sx2 = cvFloor(fsx2);
1784
1785 sx2 = std::min(sx2, ssize - 1);
1786 sx1 = std::min(sx1, sx2);
1787
1788 if( sx1 - fsx1 > 1e-3 )
1789 {
1790 assert( k < ssize*2 );
1791 tab[k].di = dx * cn;
1792 tab[k].si = (sx1 - 1) * cn;
1793 tab[k++].alpha = (float)((sx1 - fsx1) / cellWidth);
1794 }
1795
1796 for(int sx = sx1; sx < sx2; sx++ )
1797 {
1798 assert( k < ssize*2 );
1799 tab[k].di = dx * cn;
1800 tab[k].si = sx * cn;
1801 tab[k++].alpha = float(1.0 / cellWidth);
1802 }
1803
1804 if( fsx2 - sx2 > 1e-3 )
1805 {
1806 assert( k < ssize*2 );
1807 tab[k].di = dx * cn;
1808 tab[k].si = sx2 * cn;
1809 tab[k++].alpha = (float)(min(min(fsx2 - sx2, 1.), cellWidth) / cellWidth);
1810 }
1811 }
1812 return k;
1813}
1814
1815#if defined (HAVE_IPP) && (IPP_VERSION_MAJOR >= 7)
1816class IPPresizeInvoker :
1817 public ParallelLoopBody
1818{
1819public:
1820 IPPresizeInvoker(Mat &_src, Mat &_dst, double &_inv_scale_x, double &_inv_scale_y, int _mode, ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc _func, bool *_ok) :
1821 ParallelLoopBody(), src(_src), dst(_dst), inv_scale_x(_inv_scale_x), inv_scale_y(_inv_scale_y), mode(_mode), func(_func), ok(_ok)
1822 {
1823 *ok = true;
1824 }
1825
1826 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
1827 {
1828 int cn = src.channels();
1829 IppiRect srcroi = { 0, range.start, src.cols, range.end - range.start };
1830 int dsty = CV_IMIN(cvRound(range.start * inv_scale_y), dst.rows);
1831 int dstwidth = CV_IMIN(cvRound(src.cols * inv_scale_x), dst.cols);
1832 int dstheight = CV_IMIN(cvRound(range.end * inv_scale_y), dst.rows);
1833 IppiRect dstroi = { 0, dsty, dstwidth, dstheight - dsty };
1834 int bufsize;
1835 ippiResizeGetBufSize( srcroi, dstroi, cn, mode, &bufsize );
1836 AutoBuffer<uchar> buf(bufsize + 64);
1837 uchar* bufptr = alignPtr((uchar*)buf, 32);
1838 if( func( src.data, ippiSize(src.cols, src.rows), (int)src.step[0], srcroi, dst.data, (int)dst.step[0], dstroi, inv_scale_x, inv_scale_y, 0, 0, mode, bufptr ) < 0 )
1839 *ok = false;
1840 }
1841private:
1842 Mat &src;
1843 Mat &dst;
1844 double inv_scale_x;
1845 double inv_scale_y;
1846 int mode;
1847 ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc func;
1848 bool *ok;
1849 const IPPresizeInvoker& operator= (const IPPresizeInvoker&);
1850};
1851#endif
1852
1853}
1854
1855
1856//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1857
1858void cv::resize( InputArray _src, OutputArray _dst, Size dsize,
1859 double inv_scale_x, double inv_scale_y, int interpolation )
1860{
1861 static ResizeFunc linear_tab[] =
1862 {
1863 resizeGeneric_<
1864 HResizeLinear<uchar, int, short,
1865 INTER_RESIZE_COEF_SCALE,
1866 HResizeLinearVec_8u32s>,
1867 VResizeLinear<uchar, int, short,
1868 FixedPtCast<int, uchar, INTER_RESIZE_COEF_BITS*2>,
1869 VResizeLinearVec_32s8u> >,
1870 0,
1871 resizeGeneric_<
1872 HResizeLinear<ushort, float, float, 1,
1873 HResizeLinearVec_16u32f>,
1874 VResizeLinear<ushort, float, float, Cast<float, ushort>,
1875 VResizeLinearVec_32f16u> >,
1876 resizeGeneric_<
1877 HResizeLinear<short, float, float, 1,
1878 HResizeLinearVec_16s32f>,
1879 VResizeLinear<short, float, float, Cast<float, short>,
1880 VResizeLinearVec_32f16s> >,
1881 0,
1882 resizeGeneric_<
1883 HResizeLinear<float, float, float, 1,
1884 HResizeLinearVec_32f>,
1885 VResizeLinear<float, float, float, Cast<float, float>,
1886 VResizeLinearVec_32f> >,
1887 resizeGeneric_<
1888 HResizeLinear<double, double, float, 1,
1889 HResizeNoVec>,
1890 VResizeLinear<double, double, float, Cast<double, double>,
1891 VResizeNoVec> >,
1892 0
1893 };
1894
1895 static ResizeFunc cubic_tab[] =
1896 {
1897 resizeGeneric_<
1898 HResizeCubic<uchar, int, short>,
1899 VResizeCubic<uchar, int, short,
1900 FixedPtCast<int, uchar, INTER_RESIZE_COEF_BITS*2>,
1901 VResizeCubicVec_32s8u> >,
1902 0,
1903 resizeGeneric_<
1904 HResizeCubic<ushort, float, float>,
1905 VResizeCubic<ushort, float, float, Cast<float, ushort>,
1906 VResizeCubicVec_32f16u> >,
1907 resizeGeneric_<
1908 HResizeCubic<short, float, float>,
1909 VResizeCubic<short, float, float, Cast<float, short>,
1910 VResizeCubicVec_32f16s> >,
1911 0,
1912 resizeGeneric_<
1913 HResizeCubic<float, float, float>,
1914 VResizeCubic<float, float, float, Cast<float, float>,
1915 VResizeCubicVec_32f> >,
1916 resizeGeneric_<
1917 HResizeCubic<double, double, float>,
1918 VResizeCubic<double, double, float, Cast<double, double>,
1919 VResizeNoVec> >,
1920 0
1921 };
1922
1923 static ResizeFunc lanczos4_tab[] =
1924 {
1925 resizeGeneric_<HResizeLanczos4<uchar, int, short>,
1926 VResizeLanczos4<uchar, int, short,
1927 FixedPtCast<int, uchar, INTER_RESIZE_COEF_BITS*2>,
1928 VResizeNoVec> >,
1929 0,
1930 resizeGeneric_<HResizeLanczos4<ushort, float, float>,
1931 VResizeLanczos4<ushort, float, float, Cast<float, ushort>,
1932 VResizeNoVec> >,
1933 resizeGeneric_<HResizeLanczos4<short, float, float>,
1934 VResizeLanczos4<short, float, float, Cast<float, short>,
1935 VResizeNoVec> >,
1936 0,
1937 resizeGeneric_<HResizeLanczos4<float, float, float>,
1938 VResizeLanczos4<float, float, float, Cast<float, float>,
1939 VResizeNoVec> >,
1940 resizeGeneric_<HResizeLanczos4<double, double, float>,
1941 VResizeLanczos4<double, double, float, Cast<double, double>,
1942 VResizeNoVec> >,
1943 0
1944 };
1945
1946 static ResizeAreaFastFunc areafast_tab[] =
1947 {
1948 resizeAreaFast_<uchar, int, ResizeAreaFastVec<uchar> >,
1949 0,
1950 resizeAreaFast_<ushort, float, ResizeAreaFastVec<ushort> >,
1951 resizeAreaFast_<short, float, ResizeAreaFastVec<short> >,
1952 0,
1953 resizeAreaFast_<float, float, ResizeAreaFastNoVec<float, float> >,
1954 resizeAreaFast_<double, double, ResizeAreaFastNoVec<double, double> >,
1955 0
1956 };
1957
1958 static ResizeAreaFunc area_tab[] =
1959 {
1960 resizeArea_<uchar, float>, 0, resizeArea_<ushort, float>,
1961 resizeArea_<short, float>, 0, resizeArea_<float, float>,
1962 resizeArea_<double, double>, 0
1963 };
1964
1965 Mat src = _src.getMat();
1966 Size ssize = src.size();
1967
1968 CV_Assert( ssize.area() > 0 );
1969 CV_Assert( dsize.area() || (inv_scale_x > 0 && inv_scale_y > 0) );
1970 if( !dsize.area() )
1971 {
1972 dsize = Size(saturate_cast<int>(src.cols*inv_scale_x),
1973 saturate_cast<int>(src.rows*inv_scale_y));
1974 CV_Assert( dsize.area() );
1975 }
1976 else
1977 {
1978 inv_scale_x = (double)dsize.width/src.cols;
1979 inv_scale_y = (double)dsize.height/src.rows;
1980 }
1981 _dst.create(dsize, src.type());
1982 Mat dst = _dst.getMat();
1983
1984
1985#ifdef HAVE_TEGRA_OPTIMIZATION
1986 if (tegra::resize(src, dst, (float)inv_scale_x, (float)inv_scale_y, interpolation))
1987 return;
1988#endif
1989
1990 int depth = src.depth(), cn = src.channels();
1991 double scale_x = 1./inv_scale_x, scale_y = 1./inv_scale_y;
1992 int k, sx, sy, dx, dy;
1993/*
1994#if defined (HAVE_IPP) && (IPP_VERSION_MAJOR >= 7)
1995 int mode = interpolation == INTER_LINEAR ? IPPI_INTER_LINEAR : 0;
1996 int type = src.type();
1997 ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc ippFunc =
1998 type == CV_8UC1 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_8u_C1R :
1999 type == CV_8UC3 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_8u_C3R :
2000 type == CV_8UC4 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_8u_C4R :
2001 type == CV_16UC1 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_16u_C1R :
2002 type == CV_16UC3 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_16u_C3R :
2003 type == CV_16UC4 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_16u_C4R :
2004 type == CV_16SC1 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_16s_C1R :
2005 type == CV_16SC3 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_16s_C3R :
2006 type == CV_16SC4 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_16s_C4R :
2007 type == CV_32FC1 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_32f_C1R :
2008 type == CV_32FC3 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_32f_C3R :
2009 type == CV_32FC4 ? (ippiResizeSqrPixelFunc)ippiResizeSqrPixel_32f_C4R :
2010 0;
2011 if( ippFunc && mode != 0 )
2012 {
2013 bool ok;
2014 Range range(0, src.rows);
2015 IPPresizeInvoker invoker(src, dst, inv_scale_x, inv_scale_y, mode, ippFunc, &ok);
2016 parallel_for_(range, invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
2017 if( ok )
2018 return;
2019 }
2020#endif
2021*/
2022 if( interpolation == INTER_NEAREST )
2023 {
2024 resizeNN( src, dst, inv_scale_x, inv_scale_y );
2025 return;
2026 }
2027
2028 {
2029 int iscale_x = saturate_cast<int>(scale_x);
2030 int iscale_y = saturate_cast<int>(scale_y);
2031
2032 bool is_area_fast = std::abs(scale_x - iscale_x) < DBL_EPSILON &&
2033 std::abs(scale_y - iscale_y) < DBL_EPSILON;
2034
2035 // in case of scale_x && scale_y is equal to 2
2036 // INTER_AREA (fast) also is equal to INTER_LINEAR
2037 if( interpolation == INTER_LINEAR && is_area_fast && iscale_x == 2 && iscale_y == 2 )
2038 {
2039 interpolation = INTER_AREA;
2040 }
2041
2042 // true "area" interpolation is only implemented for the case (scale_x <= 1 && scale_y <= 1).
2043 // In other cases it is emulated using some variant of bilinear interpolation
2044 if( interpolation == INTER_AREA && scale_x >= 1 && scale_y >= 1 )
2045 {
2046 if( is_area_fast )
2047 {
2048 int area = iscale_x*iscale_y;
2049 size_t srcstep = src.step / src.elemSize1();
2050 AutoBuffer<int> _ofs(area + dsize.width*cn);
2051 int* ofs = _ofs;
2052 int* xofs = ofs + area;
2053 ResizeAreaFastFunc func = areafast_tab[depth];
2054 CV_Assert( func != 0 );
2055
2056 for( sy = 0, k = 0; sy < iscale_y; sy++ )
2057 for( sx = 0; sx < iscale_x; sx++ )
2058 ofs[k++] = (int)(sy*srcstep + sx*cn);
2059
2060 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
2061 {
2062 int j = dx * cn;
2063 sx = iscale_x * j;
2064 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2065 xofs[j + k] = sx + k;
2066 }
2067
2068 func( src, dst, ofs, xofs, iscale_x, iscale_y );
2069 return;
2070 }
2071
2072 ResizeAreaFunc func = area_tab[depth];
2073 CV_Assert( func != 0 && cn <= 4 );
2074
2075 AutoBuffer<DecimateAlpha> _xytab((ssize.width + ssize.height)*2);
2076 DecimateAlpha* xtab = _xytab, *ytab = xtab + ssize.width*2;
2077
2078 int xtab_size = computeResizeAreaTab(ssize.width, dsize.width, cn, scale_x, xtab);
2079 int ytab_size = computeResizeAreaTab(ssize.height, dsize.height, 1, scale_y, ytab);
2080
2081 AutoBuffer<int> _tabofs(dsize.height + 1);
2082 int* tabofs = _tabofs;
2083 for( k = 0, dy = 0; k < ytab_size; k++ )
2084 {
2085 if( k == 0 || ytab[k].di != ytab[k-1].di )
2086 {
2087 assert( ytab[k].di == dy );
2088 tabofs[dy++] = k;
2089 }
2090 }
2091 tabofs[dy] = ytab_size;
2092
2093 func( src, dst, xtab, xtab_size, ytab, ytab_size, tabofs );
2094 return;
2095 }
2096 }
2097
2098 int xmin = 0, xmax = dsize.width, width = dsize.width*cn;
2099 bool area_mode = interpolation == INTER_AREA;
2100 bool fixpt = depth == CV_8U;
2101 float fx, fy;
2102 ResizeFunc func=0;
2103 int ksize=0, ksize2;
2104 if( interpolation == INTER_CUBIC )
2105 ksize = 4, func = cubic_tab[depth];
2106 else if( interpolation == INTER_LANCZOS4 )
2107 ksize = 8, func = lanczos4_tab[depth];
2108 else if( interpolation == INTER_LINEAR || interpolation == INTER_AREA )
2109 ksize = 2, func = linear_tab[depth];
2110 else
2111 CV_Error( CV_StsBadArg, "Unknown interpolation method" );
2112 ksize2 = ksize/2;
2113
2114 CV_Assert( func != 0 );
2115
2116 AutoBuffer<uchar> _buffer((width + dsize.height)*(sizeof(int) + sizeof(float)*ksize));
2117 int* xofs = (int*)(uchar*)_buffer;
2118 int* yofs = xofs + width;
2119 float* alpha = (float*)(yofs + dsize.height);
2120 short* ialpha = (short*)alpha;
2121 float* beta = alpha + width*ksize;
2122 short* ibeta = ialpha + width*ksize;
2123 float cbuf[MAX_ESIZE];
2124
2125 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
2126 {
2127 if( !area_mode )
2128 {
2129 fx = (float)((dx+0.5)*scale_x - 0.5);
2130 sx = cvFloor(fx);
2131 fx -= sx;
2132 }
2133 else
2134 {
2135 sx = cvFloor(dx*scale_x);
2136 fx = (float)((dx+1) - (sx+1)*inv_scale_x);
2137 fx = fx <= 0 ? 0.f : fx - cvFloor(fx);
2138 }
2139
2140 if( sx < ksize2-1 )
2141 {
2142 xmin = dx+1;
2143 if( sx < 0 )
2144 fx = 0, sx = 0;
2145 }
2146
2147 if( sx + ksize2 >= ssize.width )
2148 {
2149 xmax = std::min( xmax, dx );
2150 if( sx >= ssize.width-1 )
2151 fx = 0, sx = ssize.width-1;
2152 }
2153
2154 for( k = 0, sx *= cn; k < cn; k++ )
2155 xofs[dx*cn + k] = sx + k;
2156
2157 if( interpolation == INTER_CUBIC )
2158 interpolateCubic( fx, cbuf );
2159 else if( interpolation == INTER_LANCZOS4 )
2160 interpolateLanczos4( fx, cbuf );
2161 else
2162 {
2163 cbuf[0] = 1.f - fx;
2164 cbuf[1] = fx;
2165 }
2166 if( fixpt )
2167 {
2168 for( k = 0; k < ksize; k++ )
2169 ialpha[dx*cn*ksize + k] = saturate_cast<short>(cbuf[k]*INTER_RESIZE_COEF_SCALE);
2170 for( ; k < cn*ksize; k++ )
2171 ialpha[dx*cn*ksize + k] = ialpha[dx*cn*ksize + k - ksize];
2172 }
2173 else
2174 {
2175 for( k = 0; k < ksize; k++ )
2176 alpha[dx*cn*ksize + k] = cbuf[k];
2177 for( ; k < cn*ksize; k++ )
2178 alpha[dx*cn*ksize + k] = alpha[dx*cn*ksize + k - ksize];
2179 }
2180 }
2181
2182 for( dy = 0; dy < dsize.height; dy++ )
2183 {
2184 if( !area_mode )
2185 {
2186 fy = (float)((dy+0.5)*scale_y - 0.5);
2187 sy = cvFloor(fy);
2188 fy -= sy;
2189 }
2190 else
2191 {
2192 sy = cvFloor(dy*scale_y);
2193 fy = (float)((dy+1) - (sy+1)*inv_scale_y);
2194 fy = fy <= 0 ? 0.f : fy - cvFloor(fy);
2195 }
2196
2197 yofs[dy] = sy;
2198 if( interpolation == INTER_CUBIC )
2199 interpolateCubic( fy, cbuf );
2200 else if( interpolation == INTER_LANCZOS4 )
2201 interpolateLanczos4( fy, cbuf );
2202 else
2203 {
2204 cbuf[0] = 1.f - fy;
2205 cbuf[1] = fy;
2206 }
2207
2208 if( fixpt )
2209 {
2210 for( k = 0; k < ksize; k++ )
2211 ibeta[dy*ksize + k] = saturate_cast<short>(cbuf[k]*INTER_RESIZE_COEF_SCALE);
2212 }
2213 else
2214 {
2215 for( k = 0; k < ksize; k++ )
2216 beta[dy*ksize + k] = cbuf[k];
2217 }
2218 }
2219
2220 func( src, dst, xofs, fixpt ? (void*)ialpha : (void*)alpha, yofs,
2221 fixpt ? (void*)ibeta : (void*)beta, xmin, xmax, ksize );
2222}
2223
2224
2225/****************************************************************************************\
2226* General warping (affine, perspective, remap) *
2227\****************************************************************************************/
2228
2229namespace cv
2230{
2231
2232template<typename T>
2233static void remapNearest( const Mat& _src, Mat& _dst, const Mat& _xy,
2234 int borderType, const Scalar& _borderValue )
2235{
2236 Size ssize = _src.size(), dsize = _dst.size();
2237 int cn = _src.channels();
2238 const T* S0 = (const T*)_src.data;
2239 size_t sstep = _src.step/sizeof(S0[0]);
2240 Scalar_<T> cval(saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[0]),
2241 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[1]),
2242 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[2]),
2243 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[3]));
2244 int dx, dy;
2245
2246 unsigned width1 = ssize.width, height1 = ssize.height;
2247
2248 if( _dst.isContinuous() && _xy.isContinuous() )
2249 {
2250 dsize.width *= dsize.height;
2251 dsize.height = 1;
2252 }
2253
2254 for( dy = 0; dy < dsize.height; dy++ )
2255 {
2256 T* D = (T*)(_dst.data + _dst.step*dy);
2257 const short* XY = (const short*)(_xy.data + _xy.step*dy);
2258
2259 if( cn == 1 )
2260 {
2261 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++ )
2262 {
2263 int sx = XY[dx*2], sy = XY[dx*2+1];
2264 if( (unsigned)sx < width1 && (unsigned)sy < height1 )
2265 D[dx] = S0[sy*sstep + sx];
2266 else
2267 {
2268 if( borderType == BORDER_REPLICATE )
2269 {
2270 sx = clip(sx, 0, ssize.width);
2271 sy = clip(sy, 0, ssize.height);
2272 D[dx] = S0[sy*sstep + sx];
2273 }
2274 else if( borderType == BORDER_CONSTANT )
2275 D[dx] = cval[0];
2276 else if( borderType != BORDER_TRANSPARENT )
2277 {
2278 sx = borderInterpolate(sx, ssize.width, borderType);
2279 sy = borderInterpolate(sy, ssize.height, borderType);
2280 D[dx] = S0[sy*sstep + sx];
2281 }
2282 }
2283 }
2284 }
2285 else
2286 {
2287 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++, D += cn )
2288 {
2289 int sx = XY[dx*2], sy = XY[dx*2+1], k;
2290 const T *S;
2291 if( (unsigned)sx < width1 && (unsigned)sy < height1 )
2292 {
2293 if( cn == 3 )
2294 {
2295 S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*3;
2296 D[0] = S[0], D[1] = S[1], D[2] = S[2];
2297 }
2298 else if( cn == 4 )
2299 {
2300 S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*4;
2301 D[0] = S[0], D[1] = S[1], D[2] = S[2], D[3] = S[3];
2302 }
2303 else
2304 {
2305 S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*cn;
2306 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2307 D[k] = S[k];
2308 }
2309 }
2310 else if( borderType != BORDER_TRANSPARENT )
2311 {
2312 if( borderType == BORDER_REPLICATE )
2313 {
2314 sx = clip(sx, 0, ssize.width);
2315 sy = clip(sy, 0, ssize.height);
2316 S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*cn;
2317 }
2318 else if( borderType == BORDER_CONSTANT )
2319 S = &cval[0];
2320 else
2321 {
2322 sx = borderInterpolate(sx, ssize.width, borderType);
2323 sy = borderInterpolate(sy, ssize.height, borderType);
2324 S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*cn;
2325 }
2326 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2327 D[k] = S[k];
2328 }
2329 }
2330 }
2331 }
2332}
2333
2334
2335struct RemapNoVec
2336{
2337 int operator()( const Mat&, void*, const short*, const ushort*,
2338 const void*, int ) const { return 0; }
2339};
2340
2341#if CV_SSE2
2342
2343struct RemapVec_8u
2344{
2345 int operator()( const Mat& _src, void* _dst, const short* XY,
2346 const ushort* FXY, const void* _wtab, int width ) const
2347 {
2348 int cn = _src.channels(), x = 0, sstep = (int)_src.step;
2349
2350 if( (cn != 1 && cn != 3 && cn != 4) || !checkHardwareSupport(CV_CPU_SSE2) ||
2351 sstep > 0x8000 )
2352 return 0;
2353
2354 const uchar *S0 = _src.data, *S1 = _src.data + _src.step;
2355 const short* wtab = cn == 1 ? (const short*)_wtab : &BilinearTab_iC4[0][0][0];
2356 uchar* D = (uchar*)_dst;
2357 __m128i delta = _mm_set1_epi32(INTER_REMAP_COEF_SCALE/2);
2358 __m128i xy2ofs = _mm_set1_epi32(cn + (sstep << 16));
2359 __m128i z = _mm_setzero_si128();
2360 int CV_DECL_ALIGNED(16) iofs0[4], iofs1[4];
2361
2362 if( cn == 1 )
2363 {
2364 for( ; x <= width - 8; x += 8 )
2365 {
2366 __m128i xy0 = _mm_loadu_si128( (const __m128i*)(XY + x*2));
2367 __m128i xy1 = _mm_loadu_si128( (const __m128i*)(XY + x*2 + 8));
2368 __m128i v0, v1, v2, v3, a0, a1, b0, b1;
2369 unsigned i0, i1;
2370
2371 xy0 = _mm_madd_epi16( xy0, xy2ofs );
2372 xy1 = _mm_madd_epi16( xy1, xy2ofs );
2373 _mm_store_si128( (__m128i*)iofs0, xy0 );
2374 _mm_store_si128( (__m128i*)iofs1, xy1 );
2375
2376 i0 = *(ushort*)(S0 + iofs0[0]) + (*(ushort*)(S0 + iofs0[1]) << 16);
2377 i1 = *(ushort*)(S0 + iofs0[2]) + (*(ushort*)(S0 + iofs0[3]) << 16);
2378 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(i0), _mm_cvtsi32_si128(i1));
2379 i0 = *(ushort*)(S1 + iofs0[0]) + (*(ushort*)(S1 + iofs0[1]) << 16);
2380 i1 = *(ushort*)(S1 + iofs0[2]) + (*(ushort*)(S1 + iofs0[3]) << 16);
2381 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(i0), _mm_cvtsi32_si128(i1));
2382 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v0, z);
2383 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v1, z);
2384
2385 a0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(_mm_loadl_epi64((__m128i*)(wtab+FXY[x]*4)),
2386 _mm_loadl_epi64((__m128i*)(wtab+FXY[x+1]*4)));
2387 a1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(_mm_loadl_epi64((__m128i*)(wtab+FXY[x+2]*4)),
2388 _mm_loadl_epi64((__m128i*)(wtab+FXY[x+3]*4)));
2389 b0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi64(a0, a1);
2390 b1 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(a0, a1);
2391 v0 = _mm_madd_epi16(v0, b0);
2392 v1 = _mm_madd_epi16(v1, b1);
2393 v0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(v0, v1), delta);
2394
2395 i0 = *(ushort*)(S0 + iofs1[0]) + (*(ushort*)(S0 + iofs1[1]) << 16);
2396 i1 = *(ushort*)(S0 + iofs1[2]) + (*(ushort*)(S0 + iofs1[3]) << 16);
2397 v2 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(i0), _mm_cvtsi32_si128(i1));
2398 i0 = *(ushort*)(S1 + iofs1[0]) + (*(ushort*)(S1 + iofs1[1]) << 16);
2399 i1 = *(ushort*)(S1 + iofs1[2]) + (*(ushort*)(S1 + iofs1[3]) << 16);
2400 v3 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(i0), _mm_cvtsi32_si128(i1));
2401 v2 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v2, z);
2402 v3 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v3, z);
2403
2404 a0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(_mm_loadl_epi64((__m128i*)(wtab+FXY[x+4]*4)),
2405 _mm_loadl_epi64((__m128i*)(wtab+FXY[x+5]*4)));
2406 a1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi32(_mm_loadl_epi64((__m128i*)(wtab+FXY[x+6]*4)),
2407 _mm_loadl_epi64((__m128i*)(wtab+FXY[x+7]*4)));
2408 b0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi64(a0, a1);
2409 b1 = _mm_unpackhi_epi64(a0, a1);
2410 v2 = _mm_madd_epi16(v2, b0);
2411 v3 = _mm_madd_epi16(v3, b1);
2412 v2 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(v2, v3), delta);
2413
2414 v0 = _mm_srai_epi32(v0, INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2415 v2 = _mm_srai_epi32(v2, INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2416 v0 = _mm_packus_epi16(_mm_packs_epi32(v0, v2), z);
2417 _mm_storel_epi64( (__m128i*)(D + x), v0 );
2418 }
2419 }
2420 else if( cn == 3 )
2421 {
2422 for( ; x <= width - 5; x += 4, D += 12 )
2423 {
2424 __m128i xy0 = _mm_loadu_si128( (const __m128i*)(XY + x*2));
2425 __m128i u0, v0, u1, v1;
2426
2427 xy0 = _mm_madd_epi16( xy0, xy2ofs );
2428 _mm_store_si128( (__m128i*)iofs0, xy0 );
2429 const __m128i *w0, *w1;
2430 w0 = (const __m128i*)(wtab + FXY[x]*16);
2431 w1 = (const __m128i*)(wtab + FXY[x+1]*16);
2432
2433 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[0])),
2434 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[0] + 3)));
2435 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[0])),
2436 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[0] + 3)));
2437 u1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[1])),
2438 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[1] + 3)));
2439 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[1])),
2440 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[1] + 3)));
2441 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(u0, z);
2442 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v0, z);
2443 u1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(u1, z);
2444 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v1, z);
2445 u0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_madd_epi16(u0, w0[0]), _mm_madd_epi16(v0, w0[1]));
2446 u1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_madd_epi16(u1, w1[0]), _mm_madd_epi16(v1, w1[1]));
2447 u0 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(u0, delta), INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2448 u1 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(u1, delta), INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2449 u0 = _mm_slli_si128(u0, 4);
2450 u0 = _mm_packs_epi32(u0, u1);
2451 u0 = _mm_packus_epi16(u0, u0);
2452 _mm_storel_epi64((__m128i*)D, _mm_srli_si128(u0,1));
2453
2454 w0 = (const __m128i*)(wtab + FXY[x+2]*16);
2455 w1 = (const __m128i*)(wtab + FXY[x+3]*16);
2456
2457 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[2])),
2458 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[2] + 3)));
2459 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[2])),
2460 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[2] + 3)));
2461 u1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[3])),
2462 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[3] + 3)));
2463 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[3])),
2464 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[3] + 3)));
2465 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(u0, z);
2466 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v0, z);
2467 u1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(u1, z);
2468 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v1, z);
2469 u0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_madd_epi16(u0, w0[0]), _mm_madd_epi16(v0, w0[1]));
2470 u1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_madd_epi16(u1, w1[0]), _mm_madd_epi16(v1, w1[1]));
2471 u0 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(u0, delta), INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2472 u1 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(u1, delta), INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2473 u0 = _mm_slli_si128(u0, 4);
2474 u0 = _mm_packs_epi32(u0, u1);
2475 u0 = _mm_packus_epi16(u0, u0);
2476 _mm_storel_epi64((__m128i*)(D + 6), _mm_srli_si128(u0,1));
2477 }
2478 }
2479 else if( cn == 4 )
2480 {
2481 for( ; x <= width - 4; x += 4, D += 16 )
2482 {
2483 __m128i xy0 = _mm_loadu_si128( (const __m128i*)(XY + x*2));
2484 __m128i u0, v0, u1, v1;
2485
2486 xy0 = _mm_madd_epi16( xy0, xy2ofs );
2487 _mm_store_si128( (__m128i*)iofs0, xy0 );
2488 const __m128i *w0, *w1;
2489 w0 = (const __m128i*)(wtab + FXY[x]*16);
2490 w1 = (const __m128i*)(wtab + FXY[x+1]*16);
2491
2492 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[0])),
2493 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[0] + 4)));
2494 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[0])),
2495 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[0] + 4)));
2496 u1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[1])),
2497 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[1] + 4)));
2498 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[1])),
2499 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[1] + 4)));
2500 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(u0, z);
2501 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v0, z);
2502 u1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(u1, z);
2503 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v1, z);
2504 u0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_madd_epi16(u0, w0[0]), _mm_madd_epi16(v0, w0[1]));
2505 u1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_madd_epi16(u1, w1[0]), _mm_madd_epi16(v1, w1[1]));
2506 u0 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(u0, delta), INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2507 u1 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(u1, delta), INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2508 u0 = _mm_packs_epi32(u0, u1);
2509 u0 = _mm_packus_epi16(u0, u0);
2510 _mm_storel_epi64((__m128i*)D, u0);
2511
2512 w0 = (const __m128i*)(wtab + FXY[x+2]*16);
2513 w1 = (const __m128i*)(wtab + FXY[x+3]*16);
2514
2515 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[2])),
2516 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[2] + 4)));
2517 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[2])),
2518 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[2] + 4)));
2519 u1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[3])),
2520 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S0 + iofs0[3] + 4)));
2521 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(_mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[3])),
2522 _mm_cvtsi32_si128(*(int*)(S1 + iofs0[3] + 4)));
2523 u0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(u0, z);
2524 v0 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v0, z);
2525 u1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(u1, z);
2526 v1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi8(v1, z);
2527 u0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_madd_epi16(u0, w0[0]), _mm_madd_epi16(v0, w0[1]));
2528 u1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_madd_epi16(u1, w1[0]), _mm_madd_epi16(v1, w1[1]));
2529 u0 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(u0, delta), INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2530 u1 = _mm_srai_epi32(_mm_add_epi32(u1, delta), INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS);
2531 u0 = _mm_packs_epi32(u0, u1);
2532 u0 = _mm_packus_epi16(u0, u0);
2533 _mm_storel_epi64((__m128i*)(D + 8), u0);
2534 }
2535 }
2536
2537 return x;
2538 }
2539};
2540
2541#else
2542
2543typedef RemapNoVec RemapVec_8u;
2544
2545#endif
2546
2547
2548template<class CastOp, class VecOp, typename AT>
2549static void remapBilinear( const Mat& _src, Mat& _dst, const Mat& _xy,
2550 const Mat& _fxy, const void* _wtab,
2551 int borderType, const Scalar& _borderValue )
2552{
2553 typedef typename CastOp::rtype T;
2554 typedef typename CastOp::type1 WT;
2555 Size ssize = _src.size(), dsize = _dst.size();
2556 int cn = _src.channels();
2557 const AT* wtab = (const AT*)_wtab;
2558 const T* S0 = (const T*)_src.data;
2559 size_t sstep = _src.step/sizeof(S0[0]);
2560 Scalar_<T> cval(saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[0]),
2561 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[1]),
2562 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[2]),
2563 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[3]));
2564 int dx, dy;
2565 CastOp castOp;
2566 VecOp vecOp;
2567
2568 unsigned width1 = std::max(ssize.width-1, 0), height1 = std::max(ssize.height-1, 0);
2569 CV_Assert( cn <= 4 && ssize.area() > 0 );
2570#if CV_SSE2
2571 if( _src.type() == CV_8UC3 )
2572 width1 = std::max(ssize.width-2, 0);
2573#endif
2574
2575 for( dy = 0; dy < dsize.height; dy++ )
2576 {
2577 T* D = (T*)(_dst.data + _dst.step*dy);
2578 const short* XY = (const short*)(_xy.data + _xy.step*dy);
2579 const ushort* FXY = (const ushort*)(_fxy.data + _fxy.step*dy);
2580 int X0 = 0;
2581 bool prevInlier = false;
2582
2583 for( dx = 0; dx <= dsize.width; dx++ )
2584 {
2585 bool curInlier = dx < dsize.width ?
2586 (unsigned)XY[dx*2] < width1 &&
2587 (unsigned)XY[dx*2+1] < height1 : !prevInlier;
2588 if( curInlier == prevInlier )
2589 continue;
2590
2591 int X1 = dx;
2592 dx = X0;
2593 X0 = X1;
2594 prevInlier = curInlier;
2595
2596 if( !curInlier )
2597 {
2598 int len = vecOp( _src, D, XY + dx*2, FXY + dx, wtab, X1 - dx );
2599 D += len*cn;
2600 dx += len;
2601
2602 if( cn == 1 )
2603 {
2604 for( ; dx < X1; dx++, D++ )
2605 {
2606 int sx = XY[dx*2], sy = XY[dx*2+1];
2607 const AT* w = wtab + FXY[dx]*4;
2608 const T* S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx;
2609 *D = castOp(WT(S[0]*w[0] + S[1]*w[1] + S[sstep]*w[2] + S[sstep+1]*w[3]));
2610 }
2611 }
2612 else if( cn == 2 )
2613 for( ; dx < X1; dx++, D += 2 )
2614 {
2615 int sx = XY[dx*2], sy = XY[dx*2+1];
2616 const AT* w = wtab + FXY[dx]*4;
2617 const T* S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*2;
2618 WT t0 = S[0]*w[0] + S[2]*w[1] + S[sstep]*w[2] + S[sstep+2]*w[3];
2619 WT t1 = S[1]*w[0] + S[3]*w[1] + S[sstep+1]*w[2] + S[sstep+3]*w[3];
2620 D[0] = castOp(t0); D[1] = castOp(t1);
2621 }
2622 else if( cn == 3 )
2623 for( ; dx < X1; dx++, D += 3 )
2624 {
2625 int sx = XY[dx*2], sy = XY[dx*2+1];
2626 const AT* w = wtab + FXY[dx]*4;
2627 const T* S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*3;
2628 WT t0 = S[0]*w[0] + S[3]*w[1] + S[sstep]*w[2] + S[sstep+3]*w[3];
2629 WT t1 = S[1]*w[0] + S[4]*w[1] + S[sstep+1]*w[2] + S[sstep+4]*w[3];
2630 WT t2 = S[2]*w[0] + S[5]*w[1] + S[sstep+2]*w[2] + S[sstep+5]*w[3];
2631 D[0] = castOp(t0); D[1] = castOp(t1); D[2] = castOp(t2);
2632 }
2633 else
2634 for( ; dx < X1; dx++, D += 4 )
2635 {
2636 int sx = XY[dx*2], sy = XY[dx*2+1];
2637 const AT* w = wtab + FXY[dx]*4;
2638 const T* S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*4;
2639 WT t0 = S[0]*w[0] + S[4]*w[1] + S[sstep]*w[2] + S[sstep+4]*w[3];
2640 WT t1 = S[1]*w[0] + S[5]*w[1] + S[sstep+1]*w[2] + S[sstep+5]*w[3];
2641 D[0] = castOp(t0); D[1] = castOp(t1);
2642 t0 = S[2]*w[0] + S[6]*w[1] + S[sstep+2]*w[2] + S[sstep+6]*w[3];
2643 t1 = S[3]*w[0] + S[7]*w[1] + S[sstep+3]*w[2] + S[sstep+7]*w[3];
2644 D[2] = castOp(t0); D[3] = castOp(t1);
2645 }
2646 }
2647 else
2648 {
2649 if( borderType == BORDER_TRANSPARENT && cn != 3 )
2650 {
2651 D += (X1 - dx)*cn;
2652 dx = X1;
2653 continue;
2654 }
2655
2656 if( cn == 1 )
2657 for( ; dx < X1; dx++, D++ )
2658 {
2659 int sx = XY[dx*2], sy = XY[dx*2+1];
2660 if( borderType == BORDER_CONSTANT &&
2661 (sx >= ssize.width || sx+1 < 0 ||
2662 sy >= ssize.height || sy+1 < 0) )
2663 {
2664 D[0] = cval[0];
2665 }
2666 else
2667 {
2668 int sx0, sx1, sy0, sy1;
2669 T v0, v1, v2, v3;
2670 const AT* w = wtab + FXY[dx]*4;
2671 if( borderType == BORDER_REPLICATE )
2672 {
2673 sx0 = clip(sx, 0, ssize.width);
2674 sx1 = clip(sx+1, 0, ssize.width);
2675 sy0 = clip(sy, 0, ssize.height);
2676 sy1 = clip(sy+1, 0, ssize.height);
2677 v0 = S0[sy0*sstep + sx0];
2678 v1 = S0[sy0*sstep + sx1];
2679 v2 = S0[sy1*sstep + sx0];
2680 v3 = S0[sy1*sstep + sx1];
2681 }
2682 else
2683 {
2684 sx0 = borderInterpolate(sx, ssize.width, borderType);
2685 sx1 = borderInterpolate(sx+1, ssize.width, borderType);
2686 sy0 = borderInterpolate(sy, ssize.height, borderType);
2687 sy1 = borderInterpolate(sy+1, ssize.height, borderType);
2688 v0 = sx0 >= 0 && sy0 >= 0 ? S0[sy0*sstep + sx0] : cval[0];
2689 v1 = sx1 >= 0 && sy0 >= 0 ? S0[sy0*sstep + sx1] : cval[0];
2690 v2 = sx0 >= 0 && sy1 >= 0 ? S0[sy1*sstep + sx0] : cval[0];
2691 v3 = sx1 >= 0 && sy1 >= 0 ? S0[sy1*sstep + sx1] : cval[0];
2692 }
2693 D[0] = castOp(WT(v0*w[0] + v1*w[1] + v2*w[2] + v3*w[3]));
2694 }
2695 }
2696 else
2697 for( ; dx < X1; dx++, D += cn )
2698 {
2699 int sx = XY[dx*2], sy = XY[dx*2+1], k;
2700 if( borderType == BORDER_CONSTANT &&
2701 (sx >= ssize.width || sx+1 < 0 ||
2702 sy >= ssize.height || sy+1 < 0) )
2703 {
2704 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2705 D[k] = cval[k];
2706 }
2707 else
2708 {
2709 int sx0, sx1, sy0, sy1;
2710 const T *v0, *v1, *v2, *v3;
2711 const AT* w = wtab + FXY[dx]*4;
2712 if( borderType == BORDER_REPLICATE )
2713 {
2714 sx0 = clip(sx, 0, ssize.width);
2715 sx1 = clip(sx+1, 0, ssize.width);
2716 sy0 = clip(sy, 0, ssize.height);
2717 sy1 = clip(sy+1, 0, ssize.height);
2718 v0 = S0 + sy0*sstep + sx0*cn;
2719 v1 = S0 + sy0*sstep + sx1*cn;
2720 v2 = S0 + sy1*sstep + sx0*cn;
2721 v3 = S0 + sy1*sstep + sx1*cn;
2722 }
2723 else if( borderType == BORDER_TRANSPARENT &&
2724 ((unsigned)sx >= (unsigned)(ssize.width-1) ||
2725 (unsigned)sy >= (unsigned)(ssize.height-1)))
2726 continue;
2727 else
2728 {
2729 sx0 = borderInterpolate(sx, ssize.width, borderType);
2730 sx1 = borderInterpolate(sx+1, ssize.width, borderType);
2731 sy0 = borderInterpolate(sy, ssize.height, borderType);
2732 sy1 = borderInterpolate(sy+1, ssize.height, borderType);
2733 v0 = sx0 >= 0 && sy0 >= 0 ? S0 + sy0*sstep + sx0*cn : &cval[0];
2734 v1 = sx1 >= 0 && sy0 >= 0 ? S0 + sy0*sstep + sx1*cn : &cval[0];
2735 v2 = sx0 >= 0 && sy1 >= 0 ? S0 + sy1*sstep + sx0*cn : &cval[0];
2736 v3 = sx1 >= 0 && sy1 >= 0 ? S0 + sy1*sstep + sx1*cn : &cval[0];
2737 }
2738 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2739 D[k] = castOp(WT(v0[k]*w[0] + v1[k]*w[1] + v2[k]*w[2] + v3[k]*w[3]));
2740 }
2741 }
2742 }
2743 }
2744 }
2745}
2746
2747
2748template<class CastOp, typename AT, int ONE>
2749static void remapBicubic( const Mat& _src, Mat& _dst, const Mat& _xy,
2750 const Mat& _fxy, const void* _wtab,
2751 int borderType, const Scalar& _borderValue )
2752{
2753 typedef typename CastOp::rtype T;
2754 typedef typename CastOp::type1 WT;
2755 Size ssize = _src.size(), dsize = _dst.size();
2756 int cn = _src.channels();
2757 const AT* wtab = (const AT*)_wtab;
2758 const T* S0 = (const T*)_src.data;
2759 size_t sstep = _src.step/sizeof(S0[0]);
2760 Scalar_<T> cval(saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[0]),
2761 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[1]),
2762 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[2]),
2763 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[3]));
2764 int dx, dy;
2765 CastOp castOp;
2766 int borderType1 = borderType != BORDER_TRANSPARENT ? borderType : BORDER_REFLECT_101;
2767
2768 unsigned width1 = std::max(ssize.width-3, 0), height1 = std::max(ssize.height-3, 0);
2769
2770 if( _dst.isContinuous() && _xy.isContinuous() && _fxy.isContinuous() )
2771 {
2772 dsize.width *= dsize.height;
2773 dsize.height = 1;
2774 }
2775
2776 for( dy = 0; dy < dsize.height; dy++ )
2777 {
2778 T* D = (T*)(_dst.data + _dst.step*dy);
