2779 const short* XY = (const short*)(_xy.data + _xy.step*dy);
2780 const ushort* FXY = (const ushort*)(_fxy.data + _fxy.step*dy);
2781
2782 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++, D += cn )
2783 {
2784 int sx = XY[dx*2]-1, sy = XY[dx*2+1]-1;
2785 const AT* w = wtab + FXY[dx]*16;
2786 int i, k;
2787 if( (unsigned)sx < width1 && (unsigned)sy < height1 )
2788 {
2789 const T* S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*cn;
2790 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2791 {
2792 WT sum = S[0]*w[0] + S[cn]*w[1] + S[cn*2]*w[2] + S[cn*3]*w[3];
2793 S += sstep;
2794 sum += S[0]*w[4] + S[cn]*w[5] + S[cn*2]*w[6] + S[cn*3]*w[7];
2795 S += sstep;
2796 sum += S[0]*w[8] + S[cn]*w[9] + S[cn*2]*w[10] + S[cn*3]*w[11];
2797 S += sstep;
2798 sum += S[0]*w[12] + S[cn]*w[13] + S[cn*2]*w[14] + S[cn*3]*w[15];
2799 S += 1 - sstep*3;
2800 D[k] = castOp(sum);
2801 }
2802 }
2803 else
2804 {
2805 int x[4], y[4];
2806 if( borderType == BORDER_TRANSPARENT &&
2807 ((unsigned)(sx+1) >= (unsigned)ssize.width ||
2808 (unsigned)(sy+1) >= (unsigned)ssize.height) )
2809 continue;
2810
2811 if( borderType1 == BORDER_CONSTANT &&
2812 (sx >= ssize.width || sx+4 <= 0 ||
2813 sy >= ssize.height || sy+4 <= 0))
2814 {
2815 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2816 D[k] = cval[k];
2817 continue;
2818 }
2819
2820 for( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
2821 {
2822 x[i] = borderInterpolate(sx + i, ssize.width, borderType1)*cn;
2823 y[i] = borderInterpolate(sy + i, ssize.height, borderType1);
2824 }
2825
2826 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++, S0++, w -= 16 )
2827 {
2828 WT cv = cval[k], sum = cv*ONE;
2829 for( i = 0; i < 4; i++, w += 4 )
2830 {
2831 int yi = y[i];
2832 const T* S = S0 + yi*sstep;
2833 if( yi < 0 )
2834 continue;
2835 if( x[0] >= 0 )
2836 sum += (S[x[0]] - cv)*w[0];
2837 if( x[1] >= 0 )
2838 sum += (S[x[1]] - cv)*w[1];
2839 if( x[2] >= 0 )
2840 sum += (S[x[2]] - cv)*w[2];
2841 if( x[3] >= 0 )
2842 sum += (S[x[3]] - cv)*w[3];
2843 }
2844 D[k] = castOp(sum);
2845 }
2846 S0 -= cn;
2847 }
2848 }
2849 }
2850}
2851
2852
2853template<class CastOp, typename AT, int ONE>
2854static void remapLanczos4( const Mat& _src, Mat& _dst, const Mat& _xy,
2855 const Mat& _fxy, const void* _wtab,
2856 int borderType, const Scalar& _borderValue )
2857{
2858 typedef typename CastOp::rtype T;
2859 typedef typename CastOp::type1 WT;
2860 Size ssize = _src.size(), dsize = _dst.size();
2861 int cn = _src.channels();
2862 const AT* wtab = (const AT*)_wtab;
2863 const T* S0 = (const T*)_src.data;
2864 size_t sstep = _src.step/sizeof(S0[0]);
2865 Scalar_<T> cval(saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[0]),
2866 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[1]),
2867 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[2]),
2868 saturate_cast<T>(_borderValue[3]));
2869 int dx, dy;
2870 CastOp castOp;
2871 int borderType1 = borderType != BORDER_TRANSPARENT ? borderType : BORDER_REFLECT_101;
2872
2873 unsigned width1 = std::max(ssize.width-7, 0), height1 = std::max(ssize.height-7, 0);
2874
2875 if( _dst.isContinuous() && _xy.isContinuous() && _fxy.isContinuous() )
2876 {
2877 dsize.width *= dsize.height;
2878 dsize.height = 1;
2879 }
2880
2881 for( dy = 0; dy < dsize.height; dy++ )
2882 {
2883 T* D = (T*)(_dst.data + _dst.step*dy);
2884 const short* XY = (const short*)(_xy.data + _xy.step*dy);
2885 const ushort* FXY = (const ushort*)(_fxy.data + _fxy.step*dy);
2886
2887 for( dx = 0; dx < dsize.width; dx++, D += cn )
2888 {
2889 int sx = XY[dx*2]-3, sy = XY[dx*2+1]-3;
2890 const AT* w = wtab + FXY[dx]*64;
2891 const T* S = S0 + sy*sstep + sx*cn;
2892 int i, k;
2893 if( (unsigned)sx < width1 && (unsigned)sy < height1 )
2894 {
2895 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2896 {
2897 WT sum = 0;
2898 for( int r = 0; r < 8; r++, S += sstep, w += 8 )
2899 sum += S[0]*w[0] + S[cn]*w[1] + S[cn*2]*w[2] + S[cn*3]*w[3] +
2900 S[cn*4]*w[4] + S[cn*5]*w[5] + S[cn*6]*w[6] + S[cn*7]*w[7];
2901 w -= 64;
2902 S -= sstep*8 - 1;
2903 D[k] = castOp(sum);
2904 }
2905 }
2906 else
2907 {
2908 int x[8], y[8];
2909 if( borderType == BORDER_TRANSPARENT &&
2910 ((unsigned)(sx+3) >= (unsigned)ssize.width ||
2911 (unsigned)(sy+3) >= (unsigned)ssize.height) )
2912 continue;
2913
2914 if( borderType1 == BORDER_CONSTANT &&
2915 (sx >= ssize.width || sx+8 <= 0 ||
2916 sy >= ssize.height || sy+8 <= 0))
2917 {
2918 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++ )
2919 D[k] = cval[k];
2920 continue;
2921 }
2922
2923 for( i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
2924 {
2925 x[i] = borderInterpolate(sx + i, ssize.width, borderType1)*cn;
2926 y[i] = borderInterpolate(sy + i, ssize.height, borderType1);
2927 }
2928
2929 for( k = 0; k < cn; k++, S0++, w -= 64 )
2930 {
2931 WT cv = cval[k], sum = cv*ONE;
2932 for( i = 0; i < 8; i++, w += 8 )
2933 {
2934 int yi = y[i];
2935 const T* S1 = S0 + yi*sstep;
2936 if( yi < 0 )
2937 continue;
2938 if( x[0] >= 0 )
2939 sum += (S1[x[0]] - cv)*w[0];
2940 if( x[1] >= 0 )
2941 sum += (S1[x[1]] - cv)*w[1];
2942 if( x[2] >= 0 )
2943 sum += (S1[x[2]] - cv)*w[2];
2944 if( x[3] >= 0 )
2945 sum += (S1[x[3]] - cv)*w[3];
2946 if( x[4] >= 0 )
2947 sum += (S1[x[4]] - cv)*w[4];
2948 if( x[5] >= 0 )
2949 sum += (S1[x[5]] - cv)*w[5];
2950 if( x[6] >= 0 )
2951 sum += (S1[x[6]] - cv)*w[6];
2952 if( x[7] >= 0 )
2953 sum += (S1[x[7]] - cv)*w[7];
2954 }
2955 D[k] = castOp(sum);
2956 }
2957 S0 -= cn;
2958 }
2959 }
2960 }
2961}
2962
2963
2964typedef void (*RemapNNFunc)(const Mat& _src, Mat& _dst, const Mat& _xy,
2965 int borderType, const Scalar& _borderValue );
2966
2967typedef void (*RemapFunc)(const Mat& _src, Mat& _dst, const Mat& _xy,
2968 const Mat& _fxy, const void* _wtab,
2969 int borderType, const Scalar& _borderValue);
2970
2971class RemapInvoker :
2972 public ParallelLoopBody
2973{
2974public:
2975 RemapInvoker(const Mat& _src, Mat& _dst, const Mat *_m1,
2976 const Mat *_m2, int _borderType, const Scalar &_borderValue,
2977 int _planar_input, RemapNNFunc _nnfunc, RemapFunc _ifunc, const void *_ctab) :
2978 ParallelLoopBody(), src(&_src), dst(&_dst), m1(_m1), m2(_m2),
2979 borderType(_borderType), borderValue(_borderValue),
2980 planar_input(_planar_input), nnfunc(_nnfunc), ifunc(_ifunc), ctab(_ctab)
2981 {
2982 }
2983
2984 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
2985 {
2986 int x, y, x1, y1;
2987 const int buf_size = 1 << 14;
2988 int brows0 = std::min(128, dst->rows), map_depth = m1->depth();
2989 int bcols0 = std::min(buf_size/brows0, dst->cols);
2990 brows0 = std::min(buf_size/bcols0, dst->rows);
2991 #if CV_SSE2
2992 bool useSIMD = checkHardwareSupport(CV_CPU_SSE2);
2993 #endif
2994
2995 Mat _bufxy(brows0, bcols0, CV_16SC2), _bufa;
2996 if( !nnfunc )
2997 _bufa.create(brows0, bcols0, CV_16UC1);
2998
2999 for( y = range.start; y < range.end; y += brows0 )
3000 {
3001 for( x = 0; x < dst->cols; x += bcols0 )
3002 {
3003 int brows = std::min(brows0, range.end - y);
3004 int bcols = std::min(bcols0, dst->cols - x);
3005 Mat dpart(*dst, Rect(x, y, bcols, brows));
3006 Mat bufxy(_bufxy, Rect(0, 0, bcols, brows));
3007
3008 if( nnfunc )
3009 {
3010 if( m1->type() == CV_16SC2 && !m2->data ) // the data is already in the right format
3011 bufxy = (*m1)(Rect(x, y, bcols, brows));
3012 else if( map_depth != CV_32F )
3013 {
3014 for( y1 = 0; y1 < brows; y1++ )
3015 {
3016 short* XY = (short*)(bufxy.data + bufxy.step*y1);
3017 const short* sXY = (const short*)(m1->data + m1->step*(y+y1)) + x*2;
3018 const ushort* sA = (const ushort*)(m2->data + m2->step*(y+y1)) + x;
3019
3020 for( x1 = 0; x1 < bcols; x1++ )
3021 {
3022 int a = sA[x1] & (INTER_TAB_SIZE2-1);
3023 XY[x1*2] = sXY[x1*2] + NNDeltaTab_i[a][0];
3024 XY[x1*2+1] = sXY[x1*2+1] + NNDeltaTab_i[a][1];
3025 }
3026 }
3027 }
3028 else if( !planar_input )
3029 (*m1)(Rect(x, y, bcols, brows)).convertTo(bufxy, bufxy.depth());
3030 else
3031 {
3032 for( y1 = 0; y1 < brows; y1++ )
3033 {
3034 short* XY = (short*)(bufxy.data + bufxy.step*y1);
3035 const float* sX = (const float*)(m1->data + m1->step*(y+y1)) + x;
3036 const float* sY = (const float*)(m2->data + m2->step*(y+y1)) + x;
3037 x1 = 0;
3038
3039 #if CV_SSE2
3040 if( useSIMD )
3041 {
3042 for( ; x1 <= bcols - 8; x1 += 8 )
3043 {
3044 __m128 fx0 = _mm_loadu_ps(sX + x1);
3045 __m128 fx1 = _mm_loadu_ps(sX + x1 + 4);
3046 __m128 fy0 = _mm_loadu_ps(sY + x1);
3047 __m128 fy1 = _mm_loadu_ps(sY + x1 + 4);
3048 __m128i ix0 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(fx0);
3049 __m128i ix1 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(fx1);
3050 __m128i iy0 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(fy0);
3051 __m128i iy1 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(fy1);
3052 ix0 = _mm_packs_epi32(ix0, ix1);
3053 iy0 = _mm_packs_epi32(iy0, iy1);
3054 ix1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi16(ix0, iy0);
3055 iy1 = _mm_unpackhi_epi16(ix0, iy0);
3056 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(XY + x1*2), ix1);
3057 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(XY + x1*2 + 8), iy1);
3058 }
3059 }
3060 #endif
3061
3062 for( ; x1 < bcols; x1++ )
3063 {
3064 XY[x1*2] = saturate_cast<short>(sX[x1]);
3065 XY[x1*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(sY[x1]);
3066 }
3067 }
3068 }
3069 nnfunc( *src, dpart, bufxy, borderType, borderValue );
3070 continue;
3071 }
3072
3073 Mat bufa(_bufa, Rect(0, 0, bcols, brows));
3074 for( y1 = 0; y1 < brows; y1++ )
3075 {
3076 short* XY = (short*)(bufxy.data + bufxy.step*y1);
3077 ushort* A = (ushort*)(bufa.data + bufa.step*y1);
3078
3079 if( m1->type() == CV_16SC2 && (m2->type() == CV_16UC1 || m2->type() == CV_16SC1) )
3080 {
3081 bufxy = (*m1)(Rect(x, y, bcols, brows));
3082
3083 const ushort* sA = (const ushort*)(m2->data + m2->step*(y+y1)) + x;
3084 for( x1 = 0; x1 < bcols; x1++ )
3085 A[x1] = (ushort)(sA[x1] & (INTER_TAB_SIZE2-1));
3086 }
3087 else if( planar_input )
3088 {
3089 const float* sX = (const float*)(m1->data + m1->step*(y+y1)) + x;
3090 const float* sY = (const float*)(m2->data + m2->step*(y+y1)) + x;
3091
3092 x1 = 0;
3093 #if CV_SSE2
3094 if( useSIMD )
3095 {
3096 __m128 scale = _mm_set1_ps((float)INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3097 __m128i mask = _mm_set1_epi32(INTER_TAB_SIZE-1);
3098 for( ; x1 <= bcols - 8; x1 += 8 )
3099 {
3100 __m128 fx0 = _mm_loadu_ps(sX + x1);
3101 __m128 fx1 = _mm_loadu_ps(sX + x1 + 4);
3102 __m128 fy0 = _mm_loadu_ps(sY + x1);
3103 __m128 fy1 = _mm_loadu_ps(sY + x1 + 4);
3104 __m128i ix0 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(_mm_mul_ps(fx0, scale));
3105 __m128i ix1 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(_mm_mul_ps(fx1, scale));
3106 __m128i iy0 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(_mm_mul_ps(fy0, scale));
3107 __m128i iy1 = _mm_cvtps_epi32(_mm_mul_ps(fy1, scale));
3108 __m128i mx0 = _mm_and_si128(ix0, mask);
3109 __m128i mx1 = _mm_and_si128(ix1, mask);
3110 __m128i my0 = _mm_and_si128(iy0, mask);
3111 __m128i my1 = _mm_and_si128(iy1, mask);
3112 mx0 = _mm_packs_epi32(mx0, mx1);
3113 my0 = _mm_packs_epi32(my0, my1);
3114 my0 = _mm_slli_epi16(my0, INTER_BITS);
3115 mx0 = _mm_or_si128(mx0, my0);
3116 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(A + x1), mx0);
3117 ix0 = _mm_srai_epi32(ix0, INTER_BITS);
3118 ix1 = _mm_srai_epi32(ix1, INTER_BITS);
3119 iy0 = _mm_srai_epi32(iy0, INTER_BITS);
3120 iy1 = _mm_srai_epi32(iy1, INTER_BITS);
3121 ix0 = _mm_packs_epi32(ix0, ix1);
3122 iy0 = _mm_packs_epi32(iy0, iy1);
3123 ix1 = _mm_unpacklo_epi16(ix0, iy0);
3124 iy1 = _mm_unpackhi_epi16(ix0, iy0);
3125 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(XY + x1*2), ix1);
3126 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(XY + x1*2 + 8), iy1);
3127 }
3128 }
3129 #endif
3130
3131 for( ; x1 < bcols; x1++ )
3132 {
3133 int sx = cvRound(sX[x1]*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3134 int sy = cvRound(sY[x1]*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3135 int v = (sy & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1))*INTER_TAB_SIZE + (sx & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1));
3136 XY[x1*2] = saturate_cast<short>(sx >> INTER_BITS);
3137 XY[x1*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(sy >> INTER_BITS);
3138 A[x1] = (ushort)v;
3139 }
3140 }
3141 else
3142 {
3143 const float* sXY = (const float*)(m1->data + m1->step*(y+y1)) + x*2;
3144
3145 for( x1 = 0; x1 < bcols; x1++ )
3146 {
3147 int sx = cvRound(sXY[x1*2]*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3148 int sy = cvRound(sXY[x1*2+1]*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3149 int v = (sy & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1))*INTER_TAB_SIZE + (sx & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1));
3150 XY[x1*2] = saturate_cast<short>(sx >> INTER_BITS);
3151 XY[x1*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(sy >> INTER_BITS);
3152 A[x1] = (ushort)v;
3153 }
3154 }
3155 }
3156 ifunc(*src, dpart, bufxy, bufa, ctab, borderType, borderValue);
3157 }
3158 }
3159 }
3160
3161private:
3162 const Mat* src;
3163 Mat* dst;
3164 const Mat *m1, *m2;
3165 int borderType;
3166 Scalar borderValue;
3167 int planar_input;
3168 RemapNNFunc nnfunc;
3169 RemapFunc ifunc;
3170 const void *ctab;
3171};
3172
3173}
3174
3175void cv::remap( InputArray _src, OutputArray _dst,
3176 InputArray _map1, InputArray _map2,
3177 int interpolation, int borderType, const Scalar& borderValue )
3178{
3179 static RemapNNFunc nn_tab[] =
3180 {
3181 remapNearest<uchar>, remapNearest<schar>, remapNearest<ushort>, remapNearest<short>,
3182 remapNearest<int>, remapNearest<float>, remapNearest<double>, 0
3183 };
3184
3185 static RemapFunc linear_tab[] =
3186 {
3187 remapBilinear<FixedPtCast<int, uchar, INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS>, RemapVec_8u, short>, 0,
3188 remapBilinear<Cast<float, ushort>, RemapNoVec, float>,
3189 remapBilinear<Cast<float, short>, RemapNoVec, float>, 0,
3190 remapBilinear<Cast<float, float>, RemapNoVec, float>,
3191 remapBilinear<Cast<double, double>, RemapNoVec, float>, 0
3192 };
3193
3194 static RemapFunc cubic_tab[] =
3195 {
3196 remapBicubic<FixedPtCast<int, uchar, INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS>, short, INTER_REMAP_COEF_SCALE>, 0,
3197 remapBicubic<Cast<float, ushort>, float, 1>,
3198 remapBicubic<Cast<float, short>, float, 1>, 0,
3199 remapBicubic<Cast<float, float>, float, 1>,
3200 remapBicubic<Cast<double, double>, float, 1>, 0
3201 };
3202
3203 static RemapFunc lanczos4_tab[] =
3204 {
3205 remapLanczos4<FixedPtCast<int, uchar, INTER_REMAP_COEF_BITS>, short, INTER_REMAP_COEF_SCALE>, 0,
3206 remapLanczos4<Cast<float, ushort>, float, 1>,
3207 remapLanczos4<Cast<float, short>, float, 1>, 0,
3208 remapLanczos4<Cast<float, float>, float, 1>,
3209 remapLanczos4<Cast<double, double>, float, 1>, 0
3210 };
3211
3212 Mat src = _src.getMat(), map1 = _map1.getMat(), map2 = _map2.getMat();
3213
3214 CV_Assert( map1.size().area() > 0 );
3215 CV_Assert( !map2.data || (map2.size() == map1.size()));
3216
3217 _dst.create( map1.size(), src.type() );
3218 Mat dst = _dst.getMat();
3219 if( dst.data == src.data )
3220 src = src.clone();
3221
3222 int depth = src.depth();
3223 RemapNNFunc nnfunc = 0;
3224 RemapFunc ifunc = 0;
3225 const void* ctab = 0;
3226 bool fixpt = depth == CV_8U;
3227 bool planar_input = false;
3228
3229 if( interpolation == INTER_NEAREST )
3230 {
3231 nnfunc = nn_tab[depth];
3232 CV_Assert( nnfunc != 0 );
3233 }
3234 else
3235 {
3236 if( interpolation == INTER_AREA )
3237 interpolation = INTER_LINEAR;
3238
3239 if( interpolation == INTER_LINEAR )
3240 ifunc = linear_tab[depth];
3241 else if( interpolation == INTER_CUBIC )
3242 ifunc = cubic_tab[depth];
3243 else if( interpolation == INTER_LANCZOS4 )
3244 ifunc = lanczos4_tab[depth];
3245 else
3246 CV_Error( CV_StsBadArg, "Unknown interpolation method" );
3247 CV_Assert( ifunc != 0 );
3248 ctab = initInterTab2D( interpolation, fixpt );
3249 }
3250
3251 const Mat *m1 = &map1, *m2 = &map2;
3252
3253 if( (map1.type() == CV_16SC2 && (map2.type() == CV_16UC1 || map2.type() == CV_16SC1 || !map2.data)) ||
3254 (map2.type() == CV_16SC2 && (map1.type() == CV_16UC1 || map1.type() == CV_16SC1 || !map1.data)) )
3255 {
3256 if( map1.type() != CV_16SC2 )
3257 std::swap(m1, m2);
3258 }
3259 else
3260 {
3261 CV_Assert( ((map1.type() == CV_32FC2 || map1.type() == CV_16SC2) && !map2.data) ||
3262 (map1.type() == CV_32FC1 && map2.type() == CV_32FC1) );
3263 planar_input = map1.channels() == 1;
3264 }
3265
3266 RemapInvoker invoker(src, dst, m1, m2,
3267 borderType, borderValue, planar_input, nnfunc, ifunc,
3268 ctab);
3269 parallel_for_(Range(0, dst.rows), invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
3270}
3271
3272
3273void cv::convertMaps( InputArray _map1, InputArray _map2,
3274 OutputArray _dstmap1, OutputArray _dstmap2,
3275 int dstm1type, bool nninterpolate )
3276{
3277 Mat map1 = _map1.getMat(), map2 = _map2.getMat(), dstmap1, dstmap2;
3278 Size size = map1.size();
3279 const Mat *m1 = &map1, *m2 = &map2;
3280 int m1type = m1->type(), m2type = m2->type();
3281
3282 CV_Assert( (m1type == CV_16SC2 && (nninterpolate || m2type == CV_16UC1 || m2type == CV_16SC1)) ||
3283 (m2type == CV_16SC2 && (nninterpolate || m1type == CV_16UC1 || m1type == CV_16SC1)) ||
3284 (m1type == CV_32FC1 && m2type == CV_32FC1) ||
3285 (m1type == CV_32FC2 && !m2->data) );
3286
3287 if( m2type == CV_16SC2 )
3288 {
3289 std::swap( m1, m2 );
3290 std::swap( m1type, m2type );
3291 }
3292
3293 if( dstm1type <= 0 )
3294 dstm1type = m1type == CV_16SC2 ? CV_32FC2 : CV_16SC2;
3295 CV_Assert( dstm1type == CV_16SC2 || dstm1type == CV_32FC1 || dstm1type == CV_32FC2 );
3296 _dstmap1.create( size, dstm1type );
3297 dstmap1 = _dstmap1.getMat();
3298
3299 if( !nninterpolate && dstm1type != CV_32FC2 )
3300 {
3301 _dstmap2.create( size, dstm1type == CV_16SC2 ? CV_16UC1 : CV_32FC1 );
3302 dstmap2 = _dstmap2.getMat();
3303 }
3304 else
3305 _dstmap2.release();
3306
3307 if( m1type == dstm1type || (nninterpolate &&
3308 ((m1type == CV_16SC2 && dstm1type == CV_32FC2) ||
3309 (m1type == CV_32FC2 && dstm1type == CV_16SC2))) )
3310 {
3311 m1->convertTo( dstmap1, dstmap1.type() );
3312 if( dstmap2.data && dstmap2.type() == m2->type() )
3313 m2->copyTo( dstmap2 );
3314 return;
3315 }
3316
3317 if( m1type == CV_32FC1 && dstm1type == CV_32FC2 )
3318 {
3319 Mat vdata[] = { *m1, *m2 };
3320 merge( vdata, 2, dstmap1 );
3321 return;
3322 }
3323
3324 if( m1type == CV_32FC2 && dstm1type == CV_32FC1 )
3325 {
3326 Mat mv[] = { dstmap1, dstmap2 };
3327 split( *m1, mv );
3328 return;
3329 }
3330
3331 if( m1->isContinuous() && (!m2->data || m2->isContinuous()) &&
3332 dstmap1.isContinuous() && (!dstmap2.data || dstmap2.isContinuous()) )
3333 {
3334 size.width *= size.height;
3335 size.height = 1;
3336 }
3337
3338 const float scale = 1.f/INTER_TAB_SIZE;
3339 int x, y;
3340 for( y = 0; y < size.height; y++ )
3341 {
3342 const float* src1f = (const float*)(m1->data + m1->step*y);
3343 const float* src2f = (const float*)(m2->data + m2->step*y);
3344 const short* src1 = (const short*)src1f;
3345 const ushort* src2 = (const ushort*)src2f;
3346
3347 float* dst1f = (float*)(dstmap1.data + dstmap1.step*y);
3348 float* dst2f = (float*)(dstmap2.data + dstmap2.step*y);
3349 short* dst1 = (short*)dst1f;
3350 ushort* dst2 = (ushort*)dst2f;
3351
3352 if( m1type == CV_32FC1 && dstm1type == CV_16SC2 )
3353 {
3354 if( nninterpolate )
3355 for( x = 0; x < size.width; x++ )
3356 {
3357 dst1[x*2] = saturate_cast<short>(src1f[x]);
3358 dst1[x*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(src2f[x]);
3359 }
3360 else
3361 for( x = 0; x < size.width; x++ )
3362 {
3363 int ix = saturate_cast<int>(src1f[x]*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3364 int iy = saturate_cast<int>(src2f[x]*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3365 dst1[x*2] = saturate_cast<short>(ix >> INTER_BITS);
3366 dst1[x*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(iy >> INTER_BITS);
3367 dst2[x] = (ushort)((iy & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1))*INTER_TAB_SIZE + (ix & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1)));
3368 }
3369 }
3370 else if( m1type == CV_32FC2 && dstm1type == CV_16SC2 )
3371 {
3372 if( nninterpolate )
3373 for( x = 0; x < size.width; x++ )
3374 {
3375 dst1[x*2] = saturate_cast<short>(src1f[x*2]);
3376 dst1[x*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(src1f[x*2+1]);
3377 }
3378 else
3379 for( x = 0; x < size.width; x++ )
3380 {
3381 int ix = saturate_cast<int>(src1f[x*2]*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3382 int iy = saturate_cast<int>(src1f[x*2+1]*INTER_TAB_SIZE);
3383 dst1[x*2] = saturate_cast<short>(ix >> INTER_BITS);
3384 dst1[x*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(iy >> INTER_BITS);
3385 dst2[x] = (ushort)((iy & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1))*INTER_TAB_SIZE + (ix & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1)));
3386 }
3387 }
3388 else if( m1type == CV_16SC2 && dstm1type == CV_32FC1 )
3389 {
3390 for( x = 0; x < size.width; x++ )
3391 {
3392 int fxy = src2 ? src2[x] & (INTER_TAB_SIZE2-1) : 0;
3393 dst1f[x] = src1[x*2] + (fxy & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1))*scale;
3394 dst2f[x] = src1[x*2+1] + (fxy >> INTER_BITS)*scale;
3395 }
3396 }
3397 else if( m1type == CV_16SC2 && dstm1type == CV_32FC2 )
3398 {
3399 for( x = 0; x < size.width; x++ )
3400 {
3401 int fxy = src2 ? src2[x] & (INTER_TAB_SIZE2-1): 0;
3402 dst1f[x*2] = src1[x*2] + (fxy & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1))*scale;
3403 dst1f[x*2+1] = src1[x*2+1] + (fxy >> INTER_BITS)*scale;
3404 }
3405 }
3406 else
3407 CV_Error( CV_StsNotImplemented, "Unsupported combination of input/output matrices" );
3408 }
3409}
3410
3411
3412namespace cv
3413{
3414
3415class warpAffineInvoker :
3416 public ParallelLoopBody
3417{
3418public:
3419 warpAffineInvoker(const Mat &_src, Mat &_dst, int _interpolation, int _borderType,
3420 const Scalar &_borderValue, int *_adelta, int *_bdelta, double *_M) :
3421 ParallelLoopBody(), src(_src), dst(_dst), interpolation(_interpolation),
3422 borderType(_borderType), borderValue(_borderValue), adelta(_adelta), bdelta(_bdelta),
3423 M(_M)
3424 {
3425 }
3426
3427 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
3428 {
3429 const int BLOCK_SZ = 64;
3430 short XY[BLOCK_SZ*BLOCK_SZ*2], A[BLOCK_SZ*BLOCK_SZ];
3431 const int AB_BITS = MAX(10, (int)INTER_BITS);
3432 const int AB_SCALE = 1 << AB_BITS;
3433 int round_delta = interpolation == INTER_NEAREST ? AB_SCALE/2 : AB_SCALE/INTER_TAB_SIZE/2, x, y, x1, y1;
3434 #if CV_SSE2
3435 bool useSIMD = checkHardwareSupport(CV_CPU_SSE2);
3436 #endif
3437
3438 int bh0 = std::min(BLOCK_SZ/2, dst.rows);
3439 int bw0 = std::min(BLOCK_SZ*BLOCK_SZ/bh0, dst.cols);
3440 bh0 = std::min(BLOCK_SZ*BLOCK_SZ/bw0, dst.rows);
3441
3442 for( y = range.start; y < range.end; y += bh0 )
3443 {
3444 for( x = 0; x < dst.cols; x += bw0 )
3445 {
3446 int bw = std::min( bw0, dst.cols - x);
3447 int bh = std::min( bh0, range.end - y);
3448
3449 Mat _XY(bh, bw, CV_16SC2, XY), matA;
3450 Mat dpart(dst, Rect(x, y, bw, bh));
3451
3452 for( y1 = 0; y1 < bh; y1++ )
3453 {
3454 short* xy = XY + y1*bw*2;
3455 int X0 = saturate_cast<int>((M[1]*(y + y1) + M[2])*AB_SCALE) + round_delta;
3456 int Y0 = saturate_cast<int>((M[4]*(y + y1) + M[5])*AB_SCALE) + round_delta;
3457
3458 if( interpolation == INTER_NEAREST )
3459 for( x1 = 0; x1 < bw; x1++ )
3460 {
3461 int X = (X0 + adelta[x+x1]) >> AB_BITS;
3462 int Y = (Y0 + bdelta[x+x1]) >> AB_BITS;
3463 xy[x1*2] = saturate_cast<short>(X);
3464 xy[x1*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(Y);
3465 }
3466 else
3467 {
3468 short* alpha = A + y1*bw;
3469 x1 = 0;
3470 #if CV_SSE2
3471 if( useSIMD )
3472 {
3473 __m128i fxy_mask = _mm_set1_epi32(INTER_TAB_SIZE - 1);
3474 __m128i XX = _mm_set1_epi32(X0), YY = _mm_set1_epi32(Y0);
3475 for( ; x1 <= bw - 8; x1 += 8 )
3476 {
3477 __m128i tx0, tx1, ty0, ty1;
3478 tx0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(adelta + x + x1)), XX);
3479 ty0 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(bdelta + x + x1)), YY);
3480 tx1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(adelta + x + x1 + 4)), XX);
3481 ty1 = _mm_add_epi32(_mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*)(bdelta + x + x1 + 4)), YY);
3482
3483 tx0 = _mm_srai_epi32(tx0, AB_BITS - INTER_BITS);
3484 ty0 = _mm_srai_epi32(ty0, AB_BITS - INTER_BITS);
3485 tx1 = _mm_srai_epi32(tx1, AB_BITS - INTER_BITS);
3486 ty1 = _mm_srai_epi32(ty1, AB_BITS - INTER_BITS);
3487
3488 __m128i fx_ = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_and_si128(tx0, fxy_mask),
3489 _mm_and_si128(tx1, fxy_mask));
3490 __m128i fy_ = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_and_si128(ty0, fxy_mask),
3491 _mm_and_si128(ty1, fxy_mask));
3492 tx0 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(tx0, INTER_BITS),
3493 _mm_srai_epi32(tx1, INTER_BITS));
3494 ty0 = _mm_packs_epi32(_mm_srai_epi32(ty0, INTER_BITS),
3495 _mm_srai_epi32(ty1, INTER_BITS));
3496 fx_ = _mm_adds_epi16(fx_, _mm_slli_epi16(fy_, INTER_BITS));
3497
3498 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(xy + x1*2), _mm_unpacklo_epi16(tx0, ty0));
3499 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(xy + x1*2 + 8), _mm_unpackhi_epi16(tx0, ty0));
3500 _mm_storeu_si128((__m128i*)(alpha + x1), fx_);
3501 }
3502 }
3503 #endif
3504 for( ; x1 < bw; x1++ )
3505 {
3506 int X = (X0 + adelta[x+x1]) >> (AB_BITS - INTER_BITS);
3507 int Y = (Y0 + bdelta[x+x1]) >> (AB_BITS - INTER_BITS);
3508 xy[x1*2] = saturate_cast<short>(X >> INTER_BITS);
3509 xy[x1*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(Y >> INTER_BITS);
3510 alpha[x1] = (short)((Y & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1))*INTER_TAB_SIZE +
3511 (X & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1)));
3512 }
3513 }
3514 }
3515
3516 if( interpolation == INTER_NEAREST )
3517 remap( src, dpart, _XY, Mat(), interpolation, borderType, borderValue );
3518 else
3519 {
3520 Mat _matA(bh, bw, CV_16U, A);
3521 remap( src, dpart, _XY, _matA, interpolation, borderType, borderValue );
3522 }
3523 }
3524 }
3525 }
3526
3527private:
3528 Mat src;
3529 Mat dst;
3530 int interpolation, borderType;
3531 Scalar borderValue;
3532 int *adelta, *bdelta;
3533 double *M;
3534};
3535
3536#if defined (HAVE_IPP) && (IPP_VERSION_MAJOR >= 7)
3537class IPPwarpAffineInvoker :
3538 public ParallelLoopBody
3539{
3540public:
3541 IPPwarpAffineInvoker(Mat &_src, Mat &_dst, double (&_coeffs)[2][3], int &_interpolation, int &_borderType,
3542 const Scalar &_borderValue, ippiWarpAffineBackFunc _func, bool *_ok) :
3543 ParallelLoopBody(), src(_src), dst(_dst), coeffs(_coeffs), mode(_interpolation), borderType(_borderType),
3544 borderValue(_borderValue), func(_func), ok(_ok)
3545 {
3546 *ok = true;
3547 }
3548
3549 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
3550 {
3551 IppiSize srcsize = { src.cols, src.rows };
3552 IppiRect srcroi = { 0, 0, src.cols, src.rows };
3553 IppiRect dstroi = { 0, range.start, dst.cols, range.end - range.start };
3554 int cnn = src.channels();
3555 if( borderType == BORDER_CONSTANT )
3556 {
3557 IppiSize setSize = { dst.cols, range.end - range.start };
3558 void *dataPointer = dst.data + dst.step[0] * range.start;
3559 if( !IPPSet( borderValue, dataPointer, (int)dst.step[0], setSize, cnn, src.depth() ) )
3560 {
3561 *ok = false;
3562 return;
3563 }
3564 }
3565 if( func( src.data, srcsize, (int)src.step[0], srcroi, dst.data, (int)dst.step[0], dstroi, coeffs, mode ) < 0) ////Aug 2013: problem in IPP 7.1, 8.0 : sometimes function return ippStsCoeffErr
3566 *ok = false;
3567 }
3568private:
3569 Mat &src;
3570 Mat &dst;
3571 double (&coeffs)[2][3];
3572 int mode;
3573 int borderType;
3574 Scalar borderValue;
3575 ippiWarpAffineBackFunc func;
3576 bool *ok;
3577 const IPPwarpAffineInvoker& operator= (const IPPwarpAffineInvoker&);
3578};
3579#endif
3580
3581}
3582
3583
3584void cv::warpAffine( InputArray _src, OutputArray _dst,
3585 InputArray _M0, Size dsize,
3586 int flags, int borderType, const Scalar& borderValue )
3587{
3588 Mat src = _src.getMat(), M0 = _M0.getMat();
3589 _dst.create( dsize.area() == 0 ? src.size() : dsize, src.type() );
3590 Mat dst = _dst.getMat();
3591 CV_Assert( src.cols > 0 && src.rows > 0 );
3592 if( dst.data == src.data )
3593 src = src.clone();
3594
3595 double M[6];
3596 Mat matM(2, 3, CV_64F, M);
3597 int interpolation = flags & INTER_MAX;
3598 if( interpolation == INTER_AREA )
3599 interpolation = INTER_LINEAR;
3600
3601 CV_Assert( (M0.type() == CV_32F || M0.type() == CV_64F) && M0.rows == 2 && M0.cols == 3 );
3602 M0.convertTo(matM, matM.type());
3603
3604#ifdef HAVE_TEGRA_OPTIMIZATION
3605 if( tegra::warpAffine(src, dst, M, flags, borderType, borderValue) )
3606 return;
3607#endif
3608
3609 if( !(flags & WARP_INVERSE_MAP) )
3610 {
3611 double D = M[0]*M[4] - M[1]*M[3];
3612 D = D != 0 ? 1./D : 0;
3613 double A11 = M[4]*D, A22=M[0]*D;
3614 M[0] = A11; M[1] *= -D;
3615 M[3] *= -D; M[4] = A22;
3616 double b1 = -M[0]*M[2] - M[1]*M[5];
3617 double b2 = -M[3]*M[2] - M[4]*M[5];
3618 M[2] = b1; M[5] = b2;
3619 }
3620
3621 int x;
3622 AutoBuffer<int> _abdelta(dst.cols*2);
3623 int* adelta = &_abdelta[0], *bdelta = adelta + dst.cols;
3624 const int AB_BITS = MAX(10, (int)INTER_BITS);
3625 const int AB_SCALE = 1 << AB_BITS;
3626/*
3627#if defined (HAVE_IPP) && (IPP_VERSION_MAJOR >= 7)
3628 int depth = src.depth();
3629 int channels = src.channels();
3630 if( ( depth == CV_8U || depth == CV_16U || depth == CV_32F ) &&
3631 ( channels == 1 || channels == 3 || channels == 4 ) &&
3632 ( borderType == cv::BORDER_TRANSPARENT || ( borderType == cv::BORDER_CONSTANT ) ) )
3633 {
3634 int type = src.type();
3635 ippiWarpAffineBackFunc ippFunc =
3636 type == CV_8UC1 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_8u_C1R :
3637 type == CV_8UC3 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_8u_C3R :
3638 type == CV_8UC4 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_8u_C4R :
3639 type == CV_16UC1 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_16u_C1R :
3640 type == CV_16UC3 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_16u_C3R :
3641 type == CV_16UC4 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_16u_C4R :
3642 type == CV_32FC1 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_32f_C1R :
3643 type == CV_32FC3 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_32f_C3R :
3644 type == CV_32FC4 ? (ippiWarpAffineBackFunc)ippiWarpAffineBack_32f_C4R :
3645 0;
3646 int mode =
3647 flags == INTER_LINEAR ? IPPI_INTER_LINEAR :
3648 flags == INTER_NEAREST ? IPPI_INTER_NN :
3649 flags == INTER_CUBIC ? IPPI_INTER_CUBIC :
3650 0;
3651 if( mode && ippFunc )
3652 {
3653 double coeffs[2][3];
3654 for( int i = 0; i < 2; i++ )
3655 {
3656 for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
3657 {
3658 coeffs[i][j] = matM.at<double>(i, j);
3659 }
3660 }
3661 bool ok;
3662 Range range(0, dst.rows);
3663 IPPwarpAffineInvoker invoker(src, dst, coeffs, mode, borderType, borderValue, ippFunc, &ok);
3664 parallel_for_(range, invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
3665 if( ok )
3666 return;
3667 }
3668 }
3669#endif
3670*/
3671 for( x = 0; x < dst.cols; x++ )
3672 {
3673 adelta[x] = saturate_cast<int>(M[0]*x*AB_SCALE);
3674 bdelta[x] = saturate_cast<int>(M[3]*x*AB_SCALE);
3675 }
3676
3677 Range range(0, dst.rows);
3678 warpAffineInvoker invoker(src, dst, interpolation, borderType,
3679 borderValue, adelta, bdelta, M);
3680 parallel_for_(range, invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
3681}
3682
3683
3684namespace cv
3685{
3686
3687class warpPerspectiveInvoker :
3688 public ParallelLoopBody
3689{
3690public:
3691 warpPerspectiveInvoker(const Mat &_src, Mat &_dst, double *_M, int _interpolation,
3692 int _borderType, const Scalar &_borderValue) :
3693 ParallelLoopBody(), src(_src), dst(_dst), M(_M), interpolation(_interpolation),
3694 borderType(_borderType), borderValue(_borderValue)
3695 {
3696 }
3697
3698 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
3699 {
3700 const int BLOCK_SZ = 32;
3701 short XY[BLOCK_SZ*BLOCK_SZ*2], A[BLOCK_SZ*BLOCK_SZ];
3702 int x, y, x1, y1, width = dst.cols, height = dst.rows;
3703
3704 int bh0 = std::min(BLOCK_SZ/2, height);
3705 int bw0 = std::min(BLOCK_SZ*BLOCK_SZ/bh0, width);
3706 bh0 = std::min(BLOCK_SZ*BLOCK_SZ/bw0, height);
3707
3708 for( y = range.start; y < range.end; y += bh0 )
3709 {
3710 for( x = 0; x < width; x += bw0 )
3711 {
3712 int bw = std::min( bw0, width - x);
3713 int bh = std::min( bh0, range.end - y); // height
3714
3715 Mat _XY(bh, bw, CV_16SC2, XY), matA;
3716 Mat dpart(dst, Rect(x, y, bw, bh));
3717
3718 for( y1 = 0; y1 < bh; y1++ )
3719 {
3720 short* xy = XY + y1*bw*2;
3721 double X0 = M[0]*x + M[1]*(y + y1) + M[2];
3722 double Y0 = M[3]*x + M[4]*(y + y1) + M[5];
3723 double W0 = M[6]*x + M[7]*(y + y1) + M[8];
3724
3725 if( interpolation == INTER_NEAREST )
3726 for( x1 = 0; x1 < bw; x1++ )
3727 {
3728 double W = W0 + M[6]*x1;
3729 W = W ? 1./W : 0;
3730 double fX = std::max((double)INT_MIN, std::min((double)INT_MAX, (X0 + M[0]*x1)*W));
3731 double fY = std::max((double)INT_MIN, std::min((double)INT_MAX, (Y0 + M[3]*x1)*W));
3732 int X = saturate_cast<int>(fX);
3733 int Y = saturate_cast<int>(fY);
3734
3735 xy[x1*2] = saturate_cast<short>(X);
3736 xy[x1*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(Y);
3737 }
3738 else
3739 {
3740 short* alpha = A + y1*bw;
3741 for( x1 = 0; x1 < bw; x1++ )
3742 {
3743 double W = W0 + M[6]*x1;
3744 W = W ? INTER_TAB_SIZE/W : 0;
3745 double fX = std::max((double)INT_MIN, std::min((double)INT_MAX, (X0 + M[0]*x1)*W));
3746 double fY = std::max((double)INT_MIN, std::min((double)INT_MAX, (Y0 + M[3]*x1)*W));
3747 int X = saturate_cast<int>(fX);
3748 int Y = saturate_cast<int>(fY);
3749
3750 xy[x1*2] = saturate_cast<short>(X >> INTER_BITS);
3751 xy[x1*2+1] = saturate_cast<short>(Y >> INTER_BITS);
3752 alpha[x1] = (short)((Y & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1))*INTER_TAB_SIZE +
3753 (X & (INTER_TAB_SIZE-1)));
3754 }
3755 }
3756 }
3757
3758 if( interpolation == INTER_NEAREST )
3759 remap( src, dpart, _XY, Mat(), interpolation, borderType, borderValue );
3760 else
3761 {
3762 Mat _matA(bh, bw, CV_16U, A);
3763 remap( src, dpart, _XY, _matA, interpolation, borderType, borderValue );
3764 }
3765 }
3766 }
3767 }
3768
3769private:
3770 Mat src;
3771 Mat dst;
3772 double* M;
3773 int interpolation, borderType;
3774 Scalar borderValue;
3775};
3776
3777#if defined (HAVE_IPP) && (IPP_VERSION_MAJOR >= 7)
3778class IPPwarpPerspectiveInvoker :
3779 public ParallelLoopBody
3780{
3781public:
3782 IPPwarpPerspectiveInvoker(Mat &_src, Mat &_dst, double (&_coeffs)[3][3], int &_interpolation,
3783 int &_borderType, const Scalar &_borderValue, ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc _func, bool *_ok) :
3784 ParallelLoopBody(), src(_src), dst(_dst), coeffs(_coeffs), mode(_interpolation),
3785 borderType(_borderType), borderValue(_borderValue), func(_func), ok(_ok)
3786 {
3787 *ok = true;
3788 }
3789
3790 virtual void operator() (const Range& range) const
3791 {
3792 IppiSize srcsize = {src.cols, src.rows};
3793 IppiRect srcroi = {0, 0, src.cols, src.rows};
3794 IppiRect dstroi = {0, range.start, dst.cols, range.end - range.start};
3795 int cnn = src.channels();
3796
3797 if( borderType == BORDER_CONSTANT )
3798 {
3799 IppiSize setSize = {dst.cols, range.end - range.start};
3800 void *dataPointer = dst.data + dst.step[0] * range.start;
3801 if( !IPPSet( borderValue, dataPointer, (int)dst.step[0], setSize, cnn, src.depth() ) )
3802 {
3803 *ok = false;
3804 return;
3805 }
3806 }
3807 if( func(src.data, srcsize, (int)src.step[0], srcroi, dst.data, (int)dst.step[0], dstroi, coeffs, mode) < 0)
3808 *ok = false;
3809 }
3810private:
3811 Mat &src;
3812 Mat &dst;
3813 double (&coeffs)[3][3];
3814 int mode;
3815 int borderType;
3816 const Scalar borderValue;
3817 ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc func;
3818 bool *ok;
3819 const IPPwarpPerspectiveInvoker& operator= (const IPPwarpPerspectiveInvoker&);
3820};
3821#endif
3822
3823}
3824
3825void cv::warpPerspective( InputArray _src, OutputArray _dst, InputArray _M0,
3826 Size dsize, int flags, int borderType, const Scalar& borderValue )
3827{
3828 Mat src = _src.getMat(), M0 = _M0.getMat();
3829 _dst.create( dsize.area() == 0 ? src.size() : dsize, src.type() );
3830 Mat dst = _dst.getMat();
3831
3832 CV_Assert( src.cols > 0 && src.rows > 0 );
3833 if( dst.data == src.data )
3834 src = src.clone();
3835
3836 double M[9];
3837 Mat matM(3, 3, CV_64F, M);
3838 int interpolation = flags & INTER_MAX;
3839 if( interpolation == INTER_AREA )
3840 interpolation = INTER_LINEAR;
3841
3842 CV_Assert( (M0.type() == CV_32F || M0.type() == CV_64F) && M0.rows == 3 && M0.cols == 3 );
3843 M0.convertTo(matM, matM.type());
3844
3845#ifdef HAVE_TEGRA_OPTIMIZATION
3846 if( tegra::warpPerspective(src, dst, M, flags, borderType, borderValue) )
3847 return;
3848#endif
3849
3850 if( !(flags & WARP_INVERSE_MAP) )
3851 invert(matM, matM);
3852/*
3853#if defined (HAVE_IPP) && (IPP_VERSION_MAJOR >= 7)
3854 int depth = src.depth();
3855 int channels = src.channels();
3856 if( ( depth == CV_8U || depth == CV_16U || depth == CV_32F ) &&
3857 ( channels == 1 || channels == 3 || channels == 4 ) &&
3858 ( borderType == cv::BORDER_TRANSPARENT || borderType == cv::BORDER_CONSTANT ) )
3859 {
3860 int type = src.type();
3861 ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc ippFunc =
3862 type == CV_8UC1 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_8u_C1R :
3863 type == CV_8UC3 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_8u_C3R :
3864 type == CV_8UC4 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_8u_C4R :
3865 type == CV_16UC1 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_16u_C1R :
3866 type == CV_16UC3 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_16u_C3R :
3867 type == CV_16UC4 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_16u_C4R :
3868 type == CV_32FC1 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_32f_C1R :
3869 type == CV_32FC3 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_32f_C3R :
3870 type == CV_32FC4 ? (ippiWarpPerspectiveBackFunc)ippiWarpPerspectiveBack_32f_C4R :
3871 0;
3872 int mode =
3873 flags == INTER_LINEAR ? IPPI_INTER_LINEAR :
3874 flags == INTER_NEAREST ? IPPI_INTER_NN :
3875 flags == INTER_CUBIC ? IPPI_INTER_CUBIC :
3876 0;
3877 if( mode && ippFunc )
3878 {
3879 double coeffs[3][3];
3880 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
3881 {
3882 for( int j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
3883 {
3884 coeffs[i][j] = matM.at<double>(i, j);
3885 }
3886 }
3887 bool ok;
3888 Range range(0, dst.rows);
3889 IPPwarpPerspectiveInvoker invoker(src, dst, coeffs, mode, borderType, borderValue, ippFunc, &ok);
3890 parallel_for_(range, invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
3891 if( ok )
3892 return;
3893 }
3894 }
3895#endif
3896*/
3897 Range range(0, dst.rows);
3898 warpPerspectiveInvoker invoker(src, dst, M, interpolation, borderType, borderValue);
3899 parallel_for_(range, invoker, dst.total()/(double)(1<<16));
3900}
3901
3902
3903cv::Mat cv::getRotationMatrix2D( Point2f center, double angle, double scale )
3904{
3905 angle *= CV_PI/180;
3906 double alpha = cos(angle)*scale;
3907 double beta = sin(angle)*scale;
3908
3909 Mat M(2, 3, CV_64F);
3910 double* m = (double*)M.data;
3911
3912 m[0] = alpha;
3913 m[1] = beta;
3914 m[2] = (1-alpha)*center.x - beta*center.y;
3915 m[3] = -beta;
3916 m[4] = alpha;
3917 m[5] = beta*center.x + (1-alpha)*center.y;
3918
3919 return M;
3920}
3921
3922/* Calculates coefficients of perspective transformation
3923 * which maps (xi,yi) to (ui,vi), (i=1,2,3,4):
3924 *
3925 * c00*xi + c01*yi + c02
3926 * ui = ---------------------
3927 * c20*xi + c21*yi + c22
3928 *
3929 * c10*xi + c11*yi + c12
3930 * vi = ---------------------
3931 * c20*xi + c21*yi + c22
3932 *
3933 * Coefficients are calculated by solving linear system:
3934 * / x0 y0 1 0 0 0 -x0*u0 -y0*u0 \ /c00\ /u0\
3935 * | x1 y1 1 0 0 0 -x1*u1 -y1*u1 | |c01| |u1|
3936 * | x2 y2 1 0 0 0 -x2*u2 -y2*u2 | |c02| |u2|
3937 * | x3 y3 1 0 0 0 -x3*u3 -y3*u3 |.|c10|=|u3|,
3938 * | 0 0 0 x0 y0 1 -x0*v0 -y0*v0 | |c11| |v0|
3939 * | 0 0 0 x1 y1 1 -x1*v1 -y1*v1 | |c12| |v1|
3940 * | 0 0 0 x2 y2 1 -x2*v2 -y2*v2 | |c20| |v2|
3941 * \ 0 0 0 x3 y3 1 -x3*v3 -y3*v3 / \c21/ \v3/
3942 *
3943 * where:
3944 * cij - matrix coefficients, c22 = 1
3945 */
3946cv::Mat cv::getPerspectiveTransform( const Point2f src[], const Point2f dst[] )
3947{
3948 Mat M(3, 3, CV_64F), X(8, 1, CV_64F, M.data);
3949 double a[8][8], b[8];
3950 Mat A(8, 8, CV_64F, a), B(8, 1, CV_64F, b);
3951
3952 for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
3953 {
3954 a[i][0] = a[i+4][3] = src[i].x;
3955 a[i][1] = a[i+4][4] = src[i].y;
3956 a[i][2] = a[i+4][5] = 1;
3957 a[i][3] = a[i][4] = a[i][5] =
3958 a[i+4][0] = a[i+4][1] = a[i+4][2] = 0;
3959 a[i][6] = -src[i].x*dst[i].x;
3960 a[i][7] = -src[i].y*dst[i].x;
3961 a[i+4][6] = -src[i].x*dst[i].y;
3962 a[i+4][7] = -src[i].y*dst[i].y;
3963 b[i] = dst[i].x;
3964 b[i+4] = dst[i].y;
3965 }
3966
3967 solve( A, B, X, DECOMP_SVD );
3968 ((double*)M.data)[8] = 1.;
3969
3970 return M;
3971}
3972
3973/* Calculates coefficients of affine transformation
3974 * which maps (xi,yi) to (ui,vi), (i=1,2,3):
3975 *
3976 * ui = c00*xi + c01*yi + c02
3977 *
3978 * vi = c10*xi + c11*yi + c12
3979 *
3980 * Coefficients are calculated by solving linear system:
3981 * / x0 y0 1 0 0 0 \ /c00\ /u0\
3982 * | x1 y1 1 0 0 0 | |c01| |u1|
3983 * | x2 y2 1 0 0 0 | |c02| |u2|
3984 * | 0 0 0 x0 y0 1 | |c10| |v0|
3985 * | 0 0 0 x1 y1 1 | |c11| |v1|
3986 * \ 0 0 0 x2 y2 1 / |c12| |v2|
3987 *
3988 * where:
3989 * cij - matrix coefficients
3990 */
3991
3992cv::Mat cv::getAffineTransform( const Point2f src[], const Point2f dst[] )
3993{
3994 Mat M(2, 3, CV_64F), X(6, 1, CV_64F, M.data);
3995 double a[6*6], b[6];
3996 Mat A(6, 6, CV_64F, a), B(6, 1, CV_64F, b);
3997
3998 for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
3999 {
4000 int j = i*12;
4001 int k = i*12+6;
4002 a[j] = a[k+3] = src[i].x;
4003 a[j+1] = a[k+4] = src[i].y;
4004 a[j+2] = a[k+5] = 1;
4005 a[j+3] = a[j+4] = a[j+5] = 0;
4006 a[k] = a[k+1] = a[k+2] = 0;
4007 b[i*2] = dst[i].x;
4008 b[i*2+1] = dst[i].y;
4009 }
4010
4011 solve( A, B, X );
4012 return M;
4013}
4014
4015void cv::invertAffineTransform(InputArray _matM, OutputArray __iM)
4016{
4017 Mat matM = _matM.getMat();
4018 CV_Assert(matM.rows == 2 && matM.cols == 3);
4019 __iM.create(2, 3, matM.type());
4020 Mat _iM = __iM.getMat();
4021
4022 if( matM.type() == CV_32F )
4023 {
4024 const float* M = (const float*)matM.data;
4025 float* iM = (float*)_iM.data;
4026 int step = (int)(matM.step/sizeof(M[0])), istep = (int)(_iM.step/sizeof(iM[0]));
4027
4028 double D = M[0]*M[step+1] - M[1]*M[step];
4029 D = D != 0 ? 1./D : 0;
4030 double A11 = M[step+1]*D, A22 = M[0]*D, A12 = -M[1]*D, A21 = -M[step]*D;
4031 double b1 = -A11*M[2] - A12*M[step+2];
4032 double b2 = -A21*M[2] - A22*M[step+2];
4033
4034 iM[0] = (float)A11; iM[1] = (float)A12; iM[2] = (float)b1;
4035 iM[istep] = (float)A21; iM[istep+1] = (float)A22; iM[istep+2] = (float)b2;
4036 }
4037 else if( matM.type() == CV_64F )
4038 {
4039 const double* M = (const double*)matM.data;
4040 double* iM = (double*)_iM.data;
4041 int step = (int)(matM.step/sizeof(M[0])), istep = (int)(_iM.step/sizeof(iM[0]));
4042
4043 double D = M[0]*M[step+1] - M[1]*M[step];
4044 D = D != 0 ? 1./D : 0;
4045 double A11 = M[step+1]*D, A22 = M[0]*D, A12 = -M[1]*D, A21 = -M[step]*D;
4046 double b1 = -A11*M[2] - A12*M[step+2];
4047 double b2 = -A21*M[2] - A22*M[step+2];
4048
4049 iM[0] = A11; iM[1] = A12; iM[2] = b1;
4050 iM[istep] = A21; iM[istep+1] = A22; iM[istep+2] = b2;
4051 }
4052 else
4053 CV_Error( CV_StsUnsupportedFormat, "" );
4054}
4055
4056cv::Mat cv::getPerspectiveTransform(InputArray _src, InputArray _dst)
4057{
4058 Mat src = _src.getMat(), dst = _dst.getMat();
4059 CV_Assert(src.checkVector(2, CV_32F) == 4 && dst.checkVector(2, CV_32F) == 4);
4060 return getPerspectiveTransform((const Point2f*)src.data, (const Point2f*)dst.data);
4061}
4062
4063cv::Mat cv::getAffineTransform(InputArray _src, InputArray _dst)
4064{
4065 Mat src = _src.getMat(), dst = _dst.getMat();
4066 CV_Assert(src.checkVector(2, CV_32F) == 3 && dst.checkVector(2, CV_32F) == 3);
4067 return getAffineTransform((const Point2f*)src.data, (const Point2f*)dst.data);
4068}

4111 CV_Assert( src.type() == dst.type() && dst.size() == mapx.size() );
4112 cv::remap( src, dst, mapx, mapy, flags & cv::INTER_MAX,
4113 (flags & CV_WARP_FILL_OUTLIERS) ? cv::BORDER_CONSTANT : cv::BORDER_TRANSPARENT,

4155
4156CV_IMPL void
4157cvConvertMaps( const CvArr* arr1, const CvArr* arr2, CvArr* dstarr1, CvArr* dstarr2 )
4158{
4159 cv::Mat map1 = cv::cvarrToMat(arr1), map2;
4160 cv::Mat dstmap1 = cv::cvarrToMat(dstarr1), dstmap2;
4161
4162 if( arr2 )
4163 map2 = cv::cvarrToMat(arr2);
4164 if( dstarr2 )
4165 {
4166 dstmap2 = cv::cvarrToMat(dstarr2);
4167 if( dstmap2.type() == CV_16SC1 )
4168 dstmap2 = cv::Mat(dstmap2.size(), CV_16UC1, dstmap2.data, dstmap2.step);
4169 }
4170
4171 cv::convertMaps( map1, map2, dstmap1, dstmap2, dstmap1.type(), false );
4172}
4173
4174/****************************************************************************************\
4175* Log-Polar Transform *
4176\****************************************************************************************/
4177
4178/* now it is done via Remap; more correct implementation should use
4179 some super-sampling technique outside of the "fovea" circle */
4180CV_IMPL void
4181cvLogPolar( const CvArr* srcarr, CvArr* dstarr,
4182 CvPoint2D32f center, double M, int flags )
4183{
4184 cv::Ptr<CvMat> mapx, mapy;
4185
4186 CvMat srcstub, *src = cvGetMat(srcarr, &srcstub);
4187 CvMat dststub, *dst = cvGetMat(dstarr, &dststub);
4188 CvSize ssize, dsize;
4189
4190 if( !CV_ARE_TYPES_EQ( src, dst ))
4191 CV_Error( CV_StsUnmatchedFormats, "" );
4192
4193 if( M <= 0 )
4194 CV_Error( CV_StsOutOfRange, "M should be >0" );
4195
4196 ssize = cvGetMatSize(src);
4197 dsize = cvGetMatSize(dst);
4198
4199 mapx = cvCreateMat( dsize.height, dsize.width, CV_32F );
4200 mapy = cvCreateMat( dsize.height, dsize.width, CV_32F );
4201
4202 if( !(flags & CV_WARP_INVERSE_MAP) )
4203 {
4204 int phi, rho;
4205 cv::AutoBuffer<double> _exp_tab(dsize.width);
4206 double* exp_tab = _exp_tab;
4207
4208 for( rho = 0; rho < dst->width; rho++ )
4209 exp_tab[rho] = std::exp(rho/M);
4210
4211 for( phi = 0; phi < dsize.height; phi++ )
4212 {
4213 double cp = cos(phi*2*CV_PI/dsize.height);
4214 double sp = sin(phi*2*CV_PI/dsize.height);
4215 float* mx = (float*)(mapx->data.ptr + phi*mapx->step);
4216 float* my = (float*)(mapy->data.ptr + phi*mapy->step);
4217
4218 for( rho = 0; rho < dsize.width; rho++ )
4219 {
4220 double r = exp_tab[rho];
4221 double x = r*cp + center.x;
4222 double y = r*sp + center.y;
4223
4224 mx[rho] = (float)x;
4225 my[rho] = (float)y;
4226 }
4227 }
4228 }
4229 else
4230 {
4231 int x, y;
4232 CvMat bufx, bufy, bufp, bufa;
4233 double ascale = ssize.height/(2*CV_PI);
4234 cv::AutoBuffer<float> _buf(4*dsize.width);
4235 float* buf = _buf;
4236
4237 bufx = cvMat( 1, dsize.width, CV_32F, buf );
4238 bufy = cvMat( 1, dsize.width, CV_32F, buf + dsize.width );
4239 bufp = cvMat( 1, dsize.width, CV_32F, buf + dsize.width*2 );
4240 bufa = cvMat( 1, dsize.width, CV_32F, buf + dsize.width*3 );
4241
4242 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4243 bufx.data.fl[x] = (float)x - center.x;
4244
4245 for( y = 0; y < dsize.height; y++ )
4246 {
4247 float* mx = (float*)(mapx->data.ptr + y*mapx->step);
4248 float* my = (float*)(mapy->data.ptr + y*mapy->step);
4249
4250 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4251 bufy.data.fl[x] = (float)y - center.y;
4252
4253#if 1
4254 cvCartToPolar( &bufx, &bufy, &bufp, &bufa );
4255
4256 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4257 bufp.data.fl[x] += 1.f;
4258
4259 cvLog( &bufp, &bufp );
4260
4261 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4262 {
4263 double rho = bufp.data.fl[x]*M;
4264 double phi = bufa.data.fl[x]*ascale;
4265
4266 mx[x] = (float)rho;
4267 my[x] = (float)phi;
4268 }
4269#else
4270 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4271 {
4272 double xx = bufx.data.fl[x];
4273 double yy = bufy.data.fl[x];
4274
4275 double p = log(sqrt(xx*xx + yy*yy) + 1.)*M;
4276 double a = atan2(yy,xx);
4277 if( a < 0 )
4278 a = 2*CV_PI + a;
4279 a *= ascale;
4280
4281 mx[x] = (float)p;
4282 my[x] = (float)a;
4283 }
4284#endif
4285 }
4286 }
4287
4288 cvRemap( src, dst, mapx, mapy, flags, cvScalarAll(0) );
4289}
4290
4291
4292/****************************************************************************************
4293 Linear-Polar Transform
4294 J.L. Blanco, Apr 2009
4295 ****************************************************************************************/
4296CV_IMPL
4297void cvLinearPolar( const CvArr* srcarr, CvArr* dstarr,
4298 CvPoint2D32f center, double maxRadius, int flags )
4299{
4300 cv::Ptr<CvMat> mapx, mapy;
4301
4302 CvMat srcstub, *src = (CvMat*)srcarr;
4303 CvMat dststub, *dst = (CvMat*)dstarr;
4304 CvSize ssize, dsize;
4305
4306 src = cvGetMat( srcarr, &srcstub,0,0 );
4307 dst = cvGetMat( dstarr, &dststub,0,0 );
4308
4309 if( !CV_ARE_TYPES_EQ( src, dst ))
4310 CV_Error( CV_StsUnmatchedFormats, "" );
4311
4312 ssize.width = src->cols;
4313 ssize.height = src->rows;
4314 dsize.width = dst->cols;
4315 dsize.height = dst->rows;
4316
4317 mapx = cvCreateMat( dsize.height, dsize.width, CV_32F );
4318 mapy = cvCreateMat( dsize.height, dsize.width, CV_32F );
4319
4320 if( !(flags & CV_WARP_INVERSE_MAP) )
4321 {
4322 int phi, rho;
4323
4324 for( phi = 0; phi < dsize.height; phi++ )
4325 {
4326 double cp = cos(phi*2*CV_PI/dsize.height);
4327 double sp = sin(phi*2*CV_PI/dsize.height);
4328 float* mx = (float*)(mapx->data.ptr + phi*mapx->step);
4329 float* my = (float*)(mapy->data.ptr + phi*mapy->step);
4330
4331 for( rho = 0; rho < dsize.width; rho++ )
4332 {
4333 double r = maxRadius*(rho+1)/dsize.width;
4334 double x = r*cp + center.x;
4335 double y = r*sp + center.y;
4336
4337 mx[rho] = (float)x;
4338 my[rho] = (float)y;
4339 }
4340 }
4341 }
4342 else
4343 {
4344 int x, y;
4345 CvMat bufx, bufy, bufp, bufa;
4346 const double ascale = ssize.height/(2*CV_PI);
4347 const double pscale = ssize.width/maxRadius;
4348
4349 cv::AutoBuffer<float> _buf(4*dsize.width);
4350 float* buf = _buf;
4351
4352 bufx = cvMat( 1, dsize.width, CV_32F, buf );
4353 bufy = cvMat( 1, dsize.width, CV_32F, buf + dsize.width );
4354 bufp = cvMat( 1, dsize.width, CV_32F, buf + dsize.width*2 );
4355 bufa = cvMat( 1, dsize.width, CV_32F, buf + dsize.width*3 );
4356
4357 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4358 bufx.data.fl[x] = (float)x - center.x;
4359
4360 for( y = 0; y < dsize.height; y++ )
4361 {
4362 float* mx = (float*)(mapx->data.ptr + y*mapx->step);
4363 float* my = (float*)(mapy->data.ptr + y*mapy->step);
4364
4365 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4366 bufy.data.fl[x] = (float)y - center.y;
4367
4368 cvCartToPolar( &bufx, &bufy, &bufp, &bufa, 0 );
4369
4370 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4371 bufp.data.fl[x] += 1.f;
4372
4373 for( x = 0; x < dsize.width; x++ )
4374 {
4375 double rho = bufp.data.fl[x]*pscale;
4376 double phi = bufa.data.fl[x]*ascale;
4377 mx[x] = (float)rho;
4378 my[x] = (float)phi;
4379 }
4380 }
4381 }
4382
4383 cvRemap( src, dst, mapx, mapy, flags, cvScalarAll(0) );
4384}
